item.description:
è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä»½å…³äºæ•°ç†æ–¹ç¨‹è¯¾ç¨‹ä¸­ä¸€ç»´æ³¢åŠ¨æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼ˆå¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼‰çš„è¡Œæ³¢æ³•ä¸è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼çš„å¤ä¹ æ€»ç»“ã€‚

è¿™ä»½æ€»ç»“æŒ‰ç…§â€œå®šè§£é—®é¢˜ $\to$ é€šè§£ï¼ˆè¡Œæ³¢æ³•ï¼‰$\to$ ç‰¹è§£ï¼ˆè¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼ï¼‰$\to$ ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰â€çš„é€»è¾‘æ•´ç†ï¼Œé€‚åˆæœŸæœ«å¤ä¹ æˆ–æ¢³ç†æ€è·¯ã€‚

ä¸€ã€ å®šè§£é—®é¢˜æ¨¡å‹ (The Cauchy Problem)

æˆ‘ä»¬ç ”ç©¶çš„æ˜¯æ— ç•Œå¼¦ï¼ˆæ— é™é•¿ï¼‰çš„è‡ªç”±æŒ¯åŠ¨é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ•°å­¦ä¸Šç§°ä¸ºæŸ¯è¥¿é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆåˆå€¼é—®é¢˜ï¼‰ï¼š

$$ \begin{cases} \frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial t^2} = a^2 \frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial x^2} & (-\infty < x < \infty, t > 0) \quad \text{(æ³›å®šæ–¹ç¨‹)} \\ u(x, 0) = \phi(x) & (-\infty < x < \infty) \quad \text{(åˆå§‹ä½ç§»)} \\ \frac{\partial u}{\partial t}(x, 0) = \psi(x) & (-\infty < x < \infty) \quad \text{(åˆå§‹é€Ÿåº¦)} \end{cases} $$
  • $u(x,t)$: ä»£è¡¨ä½ç§»ã€‚
  • $a$: æ³¢é€Ÿï¼Œç‰©ç†ä¸Š $a = \sqrt{T/\rho}$ï¼ˆ$T$ä¸ºå¼ åŠ›ï¼Œ$\rho$ä¸ºçº¿å¯†åº¦ï¼‰ã€‚

äºŒã€ è¡Œæ³¢æ³• (Method of Traveling Waves)

è¡Œæ³¢æ³•çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ç‰¹å¾å˜æ¢ï¼Œå°†äºŒé˜¶åå¾®åˆ†æ–¹ç¨‹åŒ–ç®€ï¼Œä»è€Œæ±‚å‡ºé€šè§£ã€‚

1. ç‰¹å¾çº¿ä¸å˜é‡ä»£æ¢

æ–¹ç¨‹ $u_{tt} - a^2 u_{xx} = 0$ å¯ä»¥å› å¼åˆ†è§£ä¸ºç®—å­å½¢å¼ï¼š

$$(\frac{\partial}{\partial t} - a\frac{\partial}{\partial x})(\frac{\partial}{\partial t} + a\frac{\partial}{\partial x})u = 0$$

è¿™æç¤ºæˆ‘ä»¬è¦å¯»æ‰¾ä½¿å¾— $x \pm at$ ä¸ºå¸¸æ•°çš„çº¿ï¼Œå³ç‰¹å¾çº¿ã€‚

å¼•å…¥æ–°å˜é‡ï¼ˆç‰¹å¾åæ ‡ï¼‰ï¼š

2. åŒ–ç®€æ–¹ç¨‹

åˆ©ç”¨é“¾å¼æ³•åˆ™å°†å…³äº $x, t$ çš„å¯¼æ•°è½¬æ¢ä¸ºå…³äº $\xi, \eta$ çš„å¯¼æ•°ï¼ŒåŸæ–¹ç¨‹åŒ–ä¸ºæ ‡å‡†å‹ï¼š

$$ \frac{\partial^2 u}{\partial \xi \partial \eta} = 0 $$

3. ç§¯åˆ†æ±‚é€šè§£

å¯¹ $\xi$ å’Œ $\eta$ åˆ†åˆ«ç§¯åˆ†ï¼Œå¾—åˆ°è¾¾æœ—è´å°”é€šè§£ï¼š

$$ u(x, t) = f(x + at) + g(x - at) $$

å…¶ä¸­ $f$ å’Œ $g$ æ˜¯ä»»æ„äºŒé˜¶å¯å¾®å‡½æ•°ã€‚

4. ç‰©ç†å«ä¹‰ï¼šè¡Œæ³¢

  • $g(x - at)$ï¼šä»£è¡¨æ³¢å½¢ä¿æŒä¸å˜ï¼Œå‘ $x$ è½´æ­£æ–¹å‘ï¼ˆå³ï¼‰ ä¼ æ’­çš„æ³¢ï¼ˆå³è¡Œæ³¢ï¼‰ã€‚
  • $f(x + at)$ï¼šä»£è¡¨æ³¢å½¢ä¿æŒä¸å˜ï¼Œå‘ $x$ è½´è´Ÿæ–¹å‘ï¼ˆå·¦ï¼‰ ä¼ æ’­çš„æ³¢ï¼ˆå·¦è¡Œæ³¢ï¼‰ã€‚
  • ç»“è®ºï¼šä¸€ç»´æ³¢åŠ¨æ–¹ç¨‹çš„è§£æ˜¯ç”±ä¸¤åˆ—å½¢çŠ¶ä¸å˜ã€æ–¹å‘ç›¸åçš„è¡Œæ³¢å åŠ è€Œæˆçš„ã€‚

ä¸‰ã€ è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼ (D’Alembert’s Formula)

1. æ¨å¯¼è¿‡ç¨‹

åˆ©ç”¨åˆå§‹æ¡ä»¶ $t=0$ æ—¶ï¼š

  1. ä½ç§»ï¼š$f(x) + g(x) = \phi(x)$
  2. é€Ÿåº¦ï¼š$a f’(x) - a g’(x) = \psi(x)$

å¯¹é€Ÿåº¦å¼åœ¨ $[0, x]$ ä¸Šç§¯åˆ†ï¼Œè”ç«‹è§£å‡º $f(x)$ å’Œ $g(x)$ï¼Œæœ€åä»£å›é€šè§£è¡¨è¾¾å¼ã€‚

2. å…¬å¼å½¢å¼ (æ ¸å¿ƒè€ƒç‚¹)

$$ u(x, t) = \frac{1}{2}[\phi(x - at) + \phi(x + at)] + \frac{1}{2a} \int_{x - at}^{x + at} \psi(\tau) d\tau $$

3. å…¬å¼çš„ç‰©ç†åˆ†è§£

è§£ç”±ä¸¤éƒ¨åˆ†ç»„æˆï¼š

  • ç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ† $\frac{1}{2}[\phi(x - at) + \phi(x + at)]$ï¼š

  • ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ† $\frac{1}{2a} \int_{x - at}^{x + at} \psi(\tau) d\tau$ï¼š
    • ç”±åˆå§‹é€Ÿåº¦ $\psi(x)$ å¼•èµ·ã€‚
    • ä»£è¡¨åˆå§‹å†²é‡å¯¹æ³¢åŠ¨çš„å½±å“ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç§¯åˆ†ç´¯ç§¯æ•ˆåº”ã€‚

å››ã€ ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰ä¸ç‰¹å¾å‡ ä½• (é‡ç‚¹ç†è§£)

ç†è§£è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼ä¸ä»…è¦ä¼šèƒŒï¼Œè¿˜è¦ç†è§£å…¶èƒŒåçš„æ—¶ç©ºå‡ ä½•æ„ä¹‰ã€‚

1. ä¾èµ–åŒºåŸŸ (Domain of Dependence)

  • é—®é¢˜ï¼š$M(x_0, t_0)$ ç‚¹çš„è§£ $u(x_0, t_0)$ ç”±å“ªäº›åˆå§‹æ•°æ®å†³å®šï¼Ÿ
  • ç»“è®ºï¼šç”± $x$ è½´ä¸ŠåŒºé—´ $[x_0 - at_0, x_0 + at_0]$ å†…çš„åˆå§‹æ•°æ®å†³å®šã€‚
  • å‡ ä½•ï¼šè¿‡ $M$ ç‚¹ä½œä¸¤æ¡ç‰¹å¾çº¿ï¼Œä¸ $x$ è½´å›´æˆçš„ä¸‰è§’å½¢ç§°ä¸ºç‰¹å¾ä¸‰è§’å½¢ã€‚è§£å®Œå…¨å–å†³äºè¯¥ä¸‰è§’å½¢åº•è¾¹ä¸Šçš„åˆå§‹å€¼ã€‚
  • ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰ï¼šæ³¢é€Ÿæ˜¯æœ‰é™çš„ï¼Œè¿œå¤„çš„æ‰°åŠ¨è¿˜æ²¡ä¼ è¿‡æ¥ï¼Œä¸ä¼šå½±å“å½“å‰ç‚¹ã€‚

2. å†³å®šåŒºåŸŸ / å½±å“åŒºåŸŸ (Domain of Influence)

  • é—®é¢˜ï¼š$x$ è½´ä¸Šä¸€ç‚¹ $P(x_0, 0)$ çš„åˆå§‹æ‰°åŠ¨ä¼šå½±å“æ—¶ç©ºä¸­çš„å“ªäº›åŒºåŸŸï¼Ÿ
  • ç»“è®ºï¼šä¼šå½±å“ç”±ä¸¤æ¡ç‰¹å¾çº¿ $x - at = x_0$ å’Œ $x + at = x_0$ å¤¹è§’å†…çš„æ‰‡å½¢åŒºåŸŸã€‚
  • ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰ï¼šæ‰°åŠ¨ä»¥é€Ÿåº¦ $a$ å‘ä¸¤ä¾§ä¼ æ’­ï¼Œå‡¡æ˜¯æ³¢å‰æ‰«è¿‡çš„åŒºåŸŸéƒ½ä¼šå—åˆ°å½±å“ã€‚

äº”ã€ æ‰©å±•åº”ç”¨ (è€ƒè¯•å¸¸è§å˜ä½“)

è™½ç„¶è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼é’ˆå¯¹çš„æ˜¯æ— ç•Œå¼¦ï¼Œä½†å¸¸ç”¨äºè§£å†³ä»¥ä¸‹å˜ä½“é—®é¢˜ï¼š

  1. åŠæ— ç•Œå¼¦ ($x > 0$) é—®é¢˜ï¼š

    • æ–¹æ³•ï¼šå»¶æ‹“æ³• (Method of Reflection)ã€‚
    • å›ºå®šç«¯ ($u|_{x=0} = 0$)ï¼šå¯¹ $\phi(x)$ å’Œ $\psi(x)$ è¿›è¡Œå¥‡å»¶æ‹“åˆ° $(-\infty, \infty)$ï¼Œç„¶åå¥—ç”¨è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼ã€‚
    • è‡ªç”±ç«¯ ($u_x|_{x=0} = 0$)ï¼šå¯¹ $\phi(x)$ å’Œ $\psi(x)$ è¿›è¡Œå¶å»¶æ‹“ã€‚

  2. éé½æ¬¡æ–¹ç¨‹ ($u_{tt} = a^2 u_{xx} + f(x,t)$)ï¼š

    • æ–¹æ³•ï¼šé½æ¬¡åŒ–åŸç† (Duhamel’s Principle / æœå“ˆæ¢…åŸç†)ã€‚
    • å°†éé½æ¬¡é¡¹ $f(x,t)$ çœ‹ä½œåœ¨ä¸åŒæ—¶åˆ»åŠ å…¥çš„â€œå¤–åŠ›â€æˆ–â€œåˆé€Ÿåº¦â€ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ç§¯åˆ†å åŠ è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼æ±‚è§£ã€‚
    • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$u(x,t) = \text{é½æ¬¡é€šè§£} + \frac{1}{2a}\int_0^t \int_{x-a(t-\tau)}^{x+a(t-\tau)} f(\xi, \tau) d\xi d\tau$$

å…­ã€ æ€»ç»“è®°å¿†è¡¨

æ¦‚å¿µ æ ¸å¿ƒå†…å®¹
æ–¹ç¨‹ $u_{tt} = a^2 u_{xx}$
è¡Œæ³¢å˜é‡ $\xi = x+at, \quad \eta = x-at$
é€šè§£ $u = f(x+at) + g(x-at)$
è¾¾æœ—è´å°”å…¬å¼ $u = \frac{1}{2}[\phi(x-at) + \phi(x+at)] + \frac{1}{2a}\int_{x-at}^{x+at}\psi(\tau)d\tau$
æ ¸å¿ƒæ€§è´¨ å åŠ æ€§ã€æœ‰é™ä¼ æ’­é€Ÿåº¦ã€ä¾èµ–åŒºåŸŸã€å½±å“åŒºåŸŸ
é€‚ç”¨èŒƒå›´ ä¸€ç»´ã€æ— ç•Œã€æ³¢åŠ¨æ–¹ç¨‹

item.description:
è¿™å¼ PPTå±•ç¤ºäº†ç•™æ•°å®šç†åœ¨è®¡ç®—å®ç§¯åˆ†æ—¶çš„ä¸‰ç§æœ€ç»å…¸åº”ç”¨åœºæ™¯ã€‚è¿™ä¸‰ç±»ç§¯åˆ†åœ¨å¤å˜å‡½æ•°è€ƒè¯•ä¸­æ˜¯å¿…è€ƒå†…å®¹ã€‚

ä¸ºäº†æ–¹ä¾¿ä½ ç†è§£å’Œè®°å¿†ï¼Œæˆ‘å°†è¿™ä¸‰ç±»ç§¯åˆ†çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ€è·¯ã€å˜æ¢å…¬å¼å’Œè®°å¿†å£è¯€æ€»ç»“å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

ä¸€ã€ ä¸‰è§’å‡½æ•°ç§¯åˆ† (å•ä½åœ†æ³•)

å½¢å¼ï¼š$\displaystyle \int_0^{2\pi} R(\cos \theta, \sin \theta) d\theta$ ï¼ˆç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šç§¯åˆ†åŒºé—´æ˜¯ $0$ åˆ° $2\pi$ï¼Œè¢«ç§¯å‡½æ•°æ˜¯æœ‰ç†ä¸‰è§’å‡½æ•°ï¼‰

æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘ï¼š æŠŠå®æ•°ç§¯åˆ†è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå¤å¹³é¢å•ä½åœ† ($|z|=1$) ä¸Šçš„å›´é“ç§¯åˆ†ã€‚

å˜æ¢å…¬å¼ (èƒŒè¯µ)ï¼š ä»¤ $z = e^{i\theta}$ï¼Œåˆ™ï¼š

  1. å¾®åˆ†æ¢å…ƒï¼š$d\theta = \frac{dz}{iz}$

  3. æ­£å¼¦æ¢å…ƒï¼š$\sin \theta = \frac{z - z^{-1}}{2i} = \frac{z^2-1}{2iz}$

è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ \text{åŸç§¯åˆ†} = 2\pi i \sum \text{Res}[f(z), z_k] $$

æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œçš„ $z_k$ å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä½äºå•ä½åœ†å†…éƒ¨ ($|z_k|<1$) çš„æç‚¹ã€‚

è®°å¿†å£è¯€ï¼š

åŒºé—´äºŒæ´¾åšä»£æ¢ï¼Œå•ä½åœ†å†…æ‰¾æç‚¹ã€‚ $d\theta$ å˜ $dz$ é™¤ $iz$ï¼Œä¸‰è§’å…¨å˜ $z$ åˆ†å¼ã€‚

äºŒã€ æ— ç©·åŒºé—´æœ‰ç†ç§¯åˆ† (ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢æ³•)

å½¢å¼ï¼š$\displaystyle \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) dx = \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} \frac{P(x)}{Q(x)} dx$ ï¼ˆç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼šä¸Šä¸‹é™æ˜¯æ— ç©·ï¼Œä¸” $R(x)$ æ˜¯åˆ†å¼ï¼‰

æ”¶æ•›æ¡ä»¶ï¼šåˆ†æ¯æ¬¡æ•°æ¯”åˆ†å­è‡³å°‘é«˜ 2 æ¬¡ ($n \ge m+2$)ï¼Œä¸”å®è½´ä¸Šæ— å¥‡ç‚¹ã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘ï¼š è¡¥ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢çš„å¤§åŠåœ†ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨å¤§åœ†å¼§ç§¯åˆ†è¶‹äº 0 (å¤§åœ†å¼•ç†)ï¼Œå°†å®è½´ç§¯åˆ†è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºé—­åˆå›è·¯ç§¯åˆ†ã€‚

è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) dx = 2\pi i \sum \text{Res}[R(z), z_k] $$

æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿™é‡Œçš„ $z_k$ å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä½äºä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ ($\text{Im } z > 0$) çš„æç‚¹ã€‚

è®°å¿†å£è¯€ï¼š

ä¸Šä¸‹æ— ç©·åšæœ‰ç†ï¼Œåˆ†æ¯é«˜äºŒæ— é¡¾è™‘ã€‚ åªå–ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ç‚¹ï¼ŒäºŒæ´¾ $i$ ä¹˜ç•™æ•°å’Œã€‚

ä¸‰ã€ å‚…é‡Œå¶å‹ç§¯åˆ† (è‹¥ä¸¹å¼•ç†æ³•)

å½¢å¼ï¼š$\displaystyle \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) e^{iax} dx \quad (a>0)$ æˆ–è€… $\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) \cos(ax) dx$ åŠ $\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) \sin(ax) dx$

æ”¶æ•›æ¡ä»¶ï¼šåˆ†æ¯æ¬¡æ•°æ¯”åˆ†å­è‡³å°‘é«˜ 1 æ¬¡ ($n \ge m+1$)ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯æ¯”ç¬¬äºŒç±»æ›´å®½æ¾çš„æ¡ä»¶ï¼Œå› ä¸º $e^{iax}$ æä¾›äº†è¡°å‡ã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘ï¼š åˆ©ç”¨ $e^{iaz}$ åœ¨ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢çš„è¡°å‡ç‰¹æ€§ï¼ˆè‹¥ä¸¹å¼•ç†ï¼‰ï¼ŒåŒæ ·è¡¥ä¸ŠåŠåœ†ã€‚å¦‚æœæ˜¯æ±‚ $\cos$ æˆ– $\sin$ çš„ç§¯åˆ†ï¼Œæœ€åå–å®éƒ¨æˆ–è™šéƒ¨å³å¯ã€‚

è®¡ç®—å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ \int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) e^{iax} dx = 2\pi i \sum \text{Res}[R(z)e^{iaz}, z_k] $$

æ³¨æ„ï¼š

  1. åªæ‰¾ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢çš„æç‚¹ã€‚
  2. è®¡ç®—ç•™æ•°æ—¶ï¼Œåƒä¸‡åˆ«å¿˜äº†æŠŠ $e^{iaz}$ å¸¦è¿›å»ç®—ï¼

è®°å¿†å£è¯€ï¼š

éœ‡è¡å› å­ $e$ æŒ‡æ•°ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸¹å¼•ç†æ¥ç›¸åŠ©ã€‚ åˆ†æ¯é«˜ä¸€å°±èƒ½ç§¯ï¼Œåƒä¸‡åˆ«å¿˜ä¹˜ $e^{iz}$ã€‚

æ€»ç»“å¯¹æ¯”è¡¨ (è€ƒå‰å¿…çœ‹)

ç±»å‹ ç§¯åˆ†åŒºé—´ å…³é”®ä»£æ¢/æ–¹æ³• æç‚¹é€‰æ‹©èŒƒå›´ ç»“æœç³»æ•°
ä¸‰è§’å‹ $[0, 2\pi]$ $z=e^{i\theta}$ å•ä½åœ†å†… ($ z
æœ‰ç†å‹ $(-\infty, +\infty)$ å¤§åœ†å›´é“ ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ ($\text{Im } z > 0$) $2\pi i$
éœ‡è¡å‹ $(-\infty, +\infty)$ ä¹˜ $e^{iax}$ + è‹¥ä¸¹å¼•ç† ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ ($\text{Im } z > 0$) $2\pi i$

ç‰¹åˆ«æé†’ï¼š å¦‚æœæ˜¯ $\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) \cos(ax) dx$ï¼Œåšé¢˜æ—¶è¦å…ˆè®¡ç®— $\int_{-\infty}^{+\infty} R(x) e^{iax} dx$ï¼Œç®—å‡ºå¤æ•°ç»“æœåï¼Œå–å®éƒ¨ (Re) æ‰æ˜¯æœ€ç»ˆç­”æ¡ˆã€‚

item.title: å…±å½¢å˜æ¢
item.description:
æ²¡é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¬ä½ çš„å»ºè®®ï¼æ—¢ç„¶å„’å¯å¤«æ–¯åŸºå˜æ¢è¶…çº²ï¼Œé‚£æˆ‘ä»¬å°±æŠŠå®ƒåˆ æ‰ï¼ŒæŠŠç«åŠ›é›†ä¸­åœ¨åˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„è¿™ä¸ªâ€œç»å¯¹æ ¸å¿ƒâ€ä¸Šï¼Œå¹¶è¾…ä»¥å¹‚å‡½æ•°å’ŒæŒ‡æ•°å‡½æ•°ã€‚

åˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„æ˜¯å¤å˜å‡½æ•°è€ƒè¯•ä¸­æœ€çµæ´»ã€è€ƒæ³•æœ€å¤šçš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œç¡®å®å€¼å¾—â€œæ·±æŒ–â€ã€‚è¿™é‡Œä¸ºä½ æ•´ç†ä¸€ä»½åŠ å¼ºç‰ˆçš„æ€»ç»“ï¼š

ä¸€ã€ ç»å¯¹æ ¸å¿ƒï¼šåˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„ (MÃ¶bius Transformation)

é€šå¼ï¼š

$$w = \frac{az+b}{cz+d} \quad (ad-bc \neq 0)$$

æ ¸å¿ƒæ€§è´¨ï¼ˆä¿åœ†æ€§ï¼‰ï¼šå®ƒå°†æ‰©å……å¤å¹³é¢ä¸Šçš„**â€œå¹¿ä¹‰åœ†â€ï¼ˆåœ†æˆ–ç›´çº¿ï¼‰æ˜ å°„ä¸ºâ€œå¹¿ä¹‰åœ†â€**ã€‚

1. ä¸¤ä¸ªâ€œå¿…èƒŒâ€çš„æ ‡å‡†æ˜ å°„å…¬å¼

è€ƒè¯•ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœé¢˜ç›®æ²¡æœ‰å¼ºåˆ¶è¦æ±‚ç”¨ä¸‰ç‚¹æ³•ï¼Œç›´æ¥å¥—ç”¨è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå…¬å¼æœ€å¿«ã€‚

(1) ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ $\leftrightarrow$ å•ä½åœ† ï¼ˆæœ€å¸¸è€ƒï¼‰ å°†ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ $\text{Im}(z) > 0$ æ˜ å°„ä¸ºå•ä½åœ† $|w| < 1$ã€‚

$$ w = e^{i\theta} \frac{z - z_0}{z - \bar{z}_0} $$
  • å‚æ•°å«ä¹‰ï¼š
    • $z_0$ï¼šä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢å†…çš„ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œå®ƒè¢«æ˜ å°„ä¸ºåœ†å¿ƒ $w=0$ï¼ˆå³ $f(z_0)=0$ï¼‰ã€‚
    • $\theta$ï¼šæ—‹è½¬å› å­ï¼Œç”±è¾¹ç•Œä¸Šçš„ç‚¹çš„å¯¹åº”å…³ç³»ç¡®å®šã€‚
  • ç‰¹ä¾‹ï¼šæœ€å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç®€å•å½¢å¼æ˜¯æŠŠ $i \to 0$ï¼š $$ w = \frac{z-i}{z+i} $$

(2) å•ä½åœ† $\leftrightarrow$ å•ä½åœ† ï¼ˆåœ†å†…è‡ªåŒæ„ï¼‰ å°†å•ä½åœ† $|z| < 1$ æ˜ å°„ä¸ºå•ä½åœ† $|w| < 1$ã€‚

$$ w = e^{i\theta} \frac{z - a}{1 - \bar{a}z} $$
  • å‚æ•°å«ä¹‰ï¼š
    • $a$ï¼šåœ†å†…çš„ä¸€ç‚¹ ($|a|<1$)ï¼Œå®ƒè¢«æ˜ å°„ä¸ºåœ†å¿ƒ $w=0$ã€‚
  • æ˜“é”™ç‚¹ï¼šæ³¨æ„åˆ†æ¯æ˜¯ $1-\bar{a}z$ï¼Œä¸è¦å’Œä¸Šé¢çš„å…¬å¼è®°æ··ã€‚

2. â€œä¸‡èƒ½é’¥åŒ™â€ï¼šä¸‰ç‚¹å®šå‹æ³•ï¼ˆäº¤æ¯”å…¬å¼ï¼‰

å½“é¢˜ç›®æ˜ç¡®ç»™å‡ºè¾¹ç•Œä¸Šçš„ä¸‰ä¸ªç‚¹æ˜ å°„åˆ°å¦å¤–ä¸‰ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆå¦‚ $z_1, z_2, z_3 \to w_1, w_2, w_3$ï¼‰æ—¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å…¬å¼ã€‚

å…¬å¼ï¼š

$$ \frac{w-w_1}{w-w_2} \cdot \frac{w_3-w_2}{w_3-w_1} = \frac{z-z_1}{z-z_2} \cdot \frac{z_3-z_2}{z_3-z_1} $$

å¤„ç† $\infty$ çš„è§„åˆ™ï¼ˆé‡è¦ï¼‰ï¼š å¦‚æœæŸä¸ªç‚¹æ˜¯ $\infty$ï¼Œåˆ™åŒ…å«è¯¥ç‚¹çš„åˆ†å­å’Œåˆ†æ¯çš„é‚£ä¸€é¡¹ç›´æ¥åˆ’æ‰ï¼ˆè§†ä¸º1ï¼‰ã€‚

  • ä¾‹å­ï¼šå¦‚æœ $z_1 = \infty$ï¼Œå³è¾¹å˜ä¸º $\frac{z_3-z_2}{z-z_2}$ã€‚
  • ä¾‹å­ï¼šå¦‚æœ $w_2 = \infty$ï¼Œå·¦è¾¹å˜ä¸º $\frac{w-w_1}{w_3-w_1}$ã€‚

3. åˆ¤æ–­æ˜ å°„æ–¹å‘çš„â€œç¥å™¨â€ï¼šä¿åŸŸæ€§ä¸å®šå‘åŸåˆ™

ç®—å‡ºè§£æå¼åï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ç¡®å®šæ˜¯æ˜ å°„åˆ°äº†åœ†å†…è¿˜æ˜¯åœ†å¤–ï¼Ÿ

  • å®šå‘åŸåˆ™ï¼ˆå³æ‰‹å®šåˆ™/å·¦æ‰‹å®šåˆ™ï¼‰ï¼š å½“ä½ æ²¿ç€è¾¹ç•Œçš„æ­£æ–¹å‘èµ°æ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœåŒºåŸŸåœ¨ä½ çš„å·¦è¾¹ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ˜ å°„åï¼ŒåŒºåŸŸä¾ç„¶åœ¨è¾¹ç•Œçš„å·¦è¾¹ã€‚
    • åº”ç”¨ï¼šæ¯”å¦‚æŠŠ $z$ å¹³é¢å®è½´ä¸Šçš„ $-1, 0, 1$ æ˜ å°„ä¸º $w$ å¹³é¢å•ä½åœ†ä¸Šçš„ $-i, 1, i$ã€‚ä½ åœ¨ $z$ è½´ä¸Šä»å·¦å‘å³èµ°ï¼ˆ$-1 \to 0 \to 1$ï¼‰ï¼Œä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢åœ¨å·¦è¾¹ã€‚çœ‹ $w$ å¹³é¢ï¼Œ$-i \to 1 \to i$ æ˜¯é€†æ—¶é’ˆï¼Œåœ†å†…ä¹Ÿåœ¨å·¦è¾¹ã€‚è¯´æ˜æ˜ å°„çš„æ˜¯å†…éƒ¨ã€‚

4. å¯¹ç§°ç‚¹åŸç†ï¼ˆSymmetry Principleï¼‰

è¿™æ˜¯è§£é«˜éš¾åº¦é¢˜çš„æ·å¾„ã€‚ åŸç†ï¼šå…³äºè¾¹ç•Œå¯¹ç§°çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªç‚¹ $z_1, z_2$ï¼Œæ˜ å°„å $w_1, w_2$ ä¾ç„¶å…³äºæ–°è¾¹ç•Œå¯¹ç§°ã€‚

  • ç›´çº¿çš„å¯¹ç§°ç‚¹ï¼šå°±æ˜¯å‡ ä½•é•œé¢å¯¹ç§°ï¼ˆå…±è½­ï¼‰ã€‚

  • åœ†çš„å¯¹ç§°ç‚¹ï¼š$z$ å’Œ $z^$ å…³äºåœ†å¿ƒä¸º $a$ã€åŠå¾„ä¸º $R$ çš„åœ†å¯¹ç§°ï¼Œæ»¡è¶³ $(z-a)(\overline{z^-a}) = R^2$ã€‚ç‰¹åˆ«åœ°ï¼Œå…³äºå•ä½åœ†ï¼Œå¯¹ç§°ç‚¹äº’ä¸ºå€’æ•°çš„å…±è½­ $z^* = 1/\bar{z}$ã€‚

  • è€ƒé¢˜åº”ç”¨ï¼š å¦‚æœé¢˜ç›®è¯´æŠŠä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢æ˜ å°„æˆå•ä½åœ†ï¼Œä¸” $f(i) = 0$ã€‚

    • å› ä¸º $i$ æ˜ å°„åˆ°åœ†å¿ƒ $0$ã€‚
    • $i$ å…³äºå®è½´ï¼ˆè¾¹ç•Œï¼‰çš„å¯¹ç§°ç‚¹æ˜¯ $-i$ã€‚
    • æ‰€ä»¥ $-i$ å¿…é¡»æ˜ å°„åˆ° $0$ å…³äºå•ä½åœ†ï¼ˆè¾¹ç•Œï¼‰çš„å¯¹ç§°ç‚¹ $\infty$ã€‚
    • ç«‹åˆ»å°±èƒ½å†™å‡ºå› å­ï¼šåˆ†å­æœ‰ $(z-i)$ï¼Œåˆ†æ¯æœ‰ $(z+i)$ã€‚

äºŒã€ è¾…åŠ©å·¥å…·ï¼šå¹‚å‡½æ•°ä¸æŒ‡æ•°å‡½æ•°

è¿™ä¸¤ç±»å‡½æ•°ä¸»è¦è´Ÿè´£**â€œæ•´å½¢â€ï¼ŒæŠŠä¸è§„åˆ™åŒºåŸŸå˜æˆå¯ä»¥ç”¨åˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„å¤„ç†çš„ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢**ã€‚

1. å¹‚å‡½æ•° $w = z^\mu$ ï¼ˆè°ƒæ•´è§’åº¦ï¼‰

  • åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæŠŠé¡¶ç‚¹åœ¨åŸç‚¹çš„è§’å½¢åŸŸï¼ˆæ‰‡å½¢ï¼‰å¼ å¼€æˆ–åˆæ‹¢ã€‚
  • å…¬å¼ï¼šè‹¥åŒºåŸŸä¸ºè§’ $\alpha < \arg z < \beta$ï¼ˆå¼ è§’ä¸º $\varphi = \beta-\alpha$ï¼‰ï¼Œæƒ³æŠŠå®ƒå˜æˆä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ï¼ˆå¼ è§’ $\pi$ï¼‰ã€‚ $$ w = e^{-i\alpha \cdot \frac{\pi}{\varphi}} \cdot z^{\frac{\pi}{\varphi}} $$ (é€šå¸¸åªè¦æ—‹è½¬åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€è¾¹ä¸å®è½´é‡åˆï¼Œç„¶åç›´æ¥ä¹˜å€æ•°å³å¯)
  • å¸¸ç”¨é€ŸæŸ¥ï¼š
    • ç¬¬ä¸€è±¡é™ $\to$ ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ï¼š$w = z^2$
    • ä¸ŠåŠåœ†ï¼ˆåŠåœ†ç›˜ï¼‰ $\to$ ç¬¬ä¸€è±¡é™ï¼šå…ˆç”¨åˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„æŠŠåŠåœ†å˜ç›´è§’ï¼Œå†ç”¨å¹‚å‡½æ•°ã€‚

2. æŒ‡æ•°å‡½æ•° $w = e^{\lambda z}$ ï¼ˆå¸¦å½¢å˜åŠé¢ï¼‰

  • åŠŸèƒ½ï¼šæŠŠå¹³è¡Œå¸¦å½¢åŒºåŸŸæ˜ å°„ä¸ºè§’å½¢åŸŸæˆ–åŠå¹³é¢ã€‚
  • å…¬å¼ï¼šå¯¹äºå®½åº¦ä¸º $h$ çš„å¸¦å½¢åŸŸã€‚ $$ w = e^{\frac{\pi}{h} z} $$
  • å¸¸ç”¨é€ŸæŸ¥ï¼š
    • å¸¦å½¢ $0 < \text{Im}(z) < \pi$ $\to$ ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ï¼š$w = e^z$

è€ƒè¯•é€šç”¨è§£é¢˜æµç¨‹

  1. çœ‹å½¢çŠ¶ï¼š

    • æ˜¯æ‰‡å½¢ï¼Ÿ $\to$ ç”¨å¹‚å‡½æ•° $z^\mu$ å˜æˆä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ã€‚
    • æ˜¯å¸¦å­ï¼Ÿ $\to$ ç”¨æŒ‡æ•° $e^z$ å˜æˆä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢ã€‚
    • æ˜¯ä¸¤ä¸ªåœ†å¼§å›´æˆçš„æœˆç‰™/çœ¼ç›ï¼Ÿ $\to$ ç”¨åˆ†å¼çº¿æ€§æ˜ å°„ï¼ŒæŠŠä¸¤ä¸ªäº¤ç‚¹åˆ†åˆ«é€åˆ° $0$ å’Œ $\infty$ï¼ŒæŠŠå®ƒå˜æˆè§’å½¢åŸŸï¼Œå†ç”¨å¹‚å‡½æ•°ã€‚

  2. æœ€åä¸€æ­¥ï¼ˆå®šå‹ï¼‰ï¼š

    • ç°åœ¨ä½ æ‰‹é‡Œä¸€å®šæ˜¯ä¸ŠåŠå¹³é¢äº†ã€‚

item.title: æ•°ç†æ–¹ç¨‹åˆ†ç¦»å˜é‡æ³•
item.description:
è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä»½éå¸¸ç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ€»ç»“éœ€æ±‚ã€‚æŒæ¡è¿™å››ç§æƒ…å†µï¼ŒåŸºæœ¬ä¸Šå°±è¦†ç›–äº†æœ¬ç§‘æ•°ç†æ–¹ç¨‹è€ƒè¯•ä¸­åˆ†ç¦»å˜é‡æ³• 90% çš„è€ƒç‚¹ã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒé€»è¾‘æ˜¯ï¼š

  1. è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶å†³å®šäº†**å›ºæœ‰å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆåŸºåº•ï¼‰**çš„å½¢å¼ï¼ˆæ˜¯ $\sin$ è¿˜æ˜¯ $\cos$ï¼‰ã€‚
  2. æ–¹ç¨‹ç±»å‹å†³å®šäº†æ—¶é—´/å¦ä¸€ç»´åº¦å‡½æ•°çš„å½¢å¼ï¼ˆæ˜¯æŒ¯è¡ã€è¡°å‡è¿˜æ˜¯åŒæ›²ï¼‰ã€‚

ç¬¬ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šä¸€ç»´æ¼”åŒ–æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼ˆå¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨ vs çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼ï¼‰

è¿™ä¸¤ç§æ–¹ç¨‹çš„ç©ºé—´éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼ˆ$x$ï¼‰å¤„ç†æ–¹å¼å®Œå…¨ä¸€æ ·ï¼ŒåŒºåˆ«ä»…åœ¨äºæ—¶é—´éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼ˆ$t$ï¼‰ã€‚

  • å¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨ (Wave): $u_{tt} = a^2 u_{xx}$ $\rightarrow$ æ—¶é—´æ˜¯æŒ¯è¡çš„ ($\sin \omega t, \cos \omega t$)ï¼Œç”šè‡³æœ‰çº¿æ€§å¢é•¿ ($t$)ã€‚
  • çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼ (Heat): $u_t = a^2 u_{xx}$ $\rightarrow$ æ—¶é—´æ˜¯è¡°å‡çš„ ($e^{-k^2 t}$)ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ˜¯å¸¸æ•°ã€‚

1. ä¸¤ç«¯å›ºå®š (Dirichlet-Dirichlet)

  • BC: $u(0)=0, u(l)=0$
  • åŸºåº•: $\sin \frac{n\pi x}{l}$
  • å¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨è§£: $$ u = \sum_{n=1}^\infty \left( C_n \cos \frac{n\pi a t}{l} + D_n \sin \frac{n\pi a t}{l} \right) \sin \frac{n\pi x}{l} $$
  • çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼è§£: $$ u = \sum_{n=1}^\infty C_n e^{-\left(\frac{n\pi a}{l}\right)^2 t} \sin \frac{n\pi x}{l} $$

2. ä¸¤ç«¯è‡ªç”± (Neumann-Neumann) â€”â€” é«˜é¢‘è€ƒç‚¹

  • BC: $u_x(0)=0, u_x(l)=0$
  • åŸºåº•: $1$ (å¯¹åº” $n=0$) å’Œ $\cos \frac{n\pi x}{l}$
  • å¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨è§£ (å«åˆšä½“ä½ç§»): $$ u = \underbrace{C_0 + D_0 t}_{\color{red}{n=0 \text{é¡¹}}} + \sum_{n=1}^\infty \left( C_n \cos \dots + D_n \sin \dots \right) \cos \frac{n\pi x}{l} $$
  • çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼è§£ (å«ç¨³æ€è§£): $$ u = \underbrace{C_0}_{\color{red}{\text{æœ€ç»ˆå¹³è¡¡æ¸©åº¦}}} + \sum_{n=1}^\infty C_n e^{-\left(\frac{n\pi a}{l}\right)^2 t} \cos \frac{n\pi x}{l} $$

3. ä¸€å›ºä¸€æ¸¸ (Mixed)

  • BC: $u(0)=0, u_x(l)=0$
  • åŸºåº•: $\sin \frac{(2n+1)\pi x}{2l}$ (åŠå¥‡æ•°å€)
  • å¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨è§£: $$ u = \sum_{n=0}^\infty (T_n(t)) \sin \frac{(2n+1)\pi x}{2l} $$
  • çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼è§£: $$ u = \sum_{n=0}^\infty C_n e^{-\left(\frac{(2n+1)\pi a}{2l}\right)^2 t} \sin \frac{(2n+1)\pi x}{2l} $$

ç¬¬äºŒéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šäºŒç»´æ‹‰æ™®æ‹‰æ–¯æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼ˆç›´è§’åæ ‡ï¼‰

æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š$u_{xx} + u_{yy} = 0$

è§£é¢˜é“å¾‹ï¼š

  1. çœ‹è¾¹ç•Œï¼šå“ªä¸¤ä¸ªå¹³è¡Œçš„è¾¹ç•Œæ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ 0ï¼ˆé½æ¬¡ï¼‰ï¼Ÿ
  2. é½æ¬¡æ–¹å‘é€‰ä¸‰è§’å‡½æ•° ($\sin, \cos$) $\rightarrow$ äº§ç”Ÿå›ºæœ‰å€¼ $\lambda_n$ã€‚
  3. éé½æ¬¡æ–¹å‘é€‰åŒæ›²å‡½æ•° ($\sinh, \cosh$) æˆ–æŒ‡æ•°å‡½æ•° ($e^y, e^{-y}$) $\rightarrow$ ä¸ºäº†å‡‘è¾¹ç•Œã€‚

æƒ…å½¢ Aï¼šå·¦å³ä¸º 0 ($x=0, x=a$ æ˜¯é½æ¬¡)

  • $X(x)$ æ–¹å‘ï¼š$\sin \frac{n\pi x}{a}$
  • $Y(y)$ æ–¹å‘ï¼š$A_n \cosh \frac{n\pi y}{a} + B_n \sinh \frac{n\pi y}{a}$ (æˆ–è€… $C_n e^{\dots} + D_n e^{-\dots}$)
  • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$ u(x,y) = \sum_{n=1}^\infty \left( A_n \cosh \frac{n\pi y}{a} + B_n \sinh \frac{n\pi y}{a} \right) \sin \frac{n\pi x}{a} $$ (ç³»æ•° $A_n, B_n$ ç”±ä¸Šä¸‹ä¸¤è¾¹çš„éé½æ¬¡æ¡ä»¶å®š)

æƒ…å½¢ Bï¼šä¸Šä¸‹ä¸º 0 ($y=0, y=b$ æ˜¯é½æ¬¡)

  • $Y(y)$ æ–¹å‘ï¼š$\sin \frac{n\pi y}{b}$
  • $X(x)$ æ–¹å‘ï¼šåŒæ›²å‡½æ•°
  • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$ u(x,y) = \sum_{n=1}^\infty \left( A_n \cosh \frac{n\pi x}{b} + B_n \sinh \frac{n\pi x}{b} \right) \sin \frac{n\pi y}{b} $$

æƒ…å½¢ Cï¼šå››å‘¨éƒ½æœ‰å€¼ (å åŠ åŸç†)

  • å¦‚æœçŸ©å½¢å››è¾¹éƒ½ä¸æ˜¯ 0ï¼Œå¿…é¡»æŠŠé—®é¢˜æ‹†æˆä¸¤ä¸ªå­é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆA + Bï¼‰ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ±‚è§£åå†ç›¸åŠ ã€‚

ç¬¬ä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šäºŒç»´æ‹‰æ™®æ‹‰æ–¯æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼ˆæåæ ‡ï¼‰

æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š$\Delta u = 0$ é€šç”¨åŸæ–™ï¼š$r^n, r^{-n}, \ln r, \text{const}$ å’Œ $\sin n\theta, \cos n\theta$ã€‚

åˆ†ç±»ä¾æ®ï¼šåŒºåŸŸæ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«åœ†å¿ƒ ($0$) å’Œæ— ç©·è¿œ ($\infty$)ã€‚

1. åœ†å†…é—®é¢˜ ($r < a$)

  • å»é™¤é¡¹ï¼š $\ln r$ (åœ¨0å¤„æ— ç©·), $r^{-n}$ (åœ¨0å¤„æ— ç©·)
  • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$ u(r,\theta) = \frac{A_0}{2} + \sum_{n=1}^\infty r^n (A_n \cos n\theta + B_n \sin n\theta) $$
  • (è¿™æ˜¯æœ€å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ³Šæ¾ç§¯åˆ†å…¬å¼çš„å‰èº«)

2. åœ†å¤–é—®é¢˜ ($r > a$)

  • å»é™¤é¡¹ï¼š $r^n$ (åœ¨$\infty$å¤„å‘æ•£), $\ln r$ (é€šå¸¸å»é™¤ï¼Œé™¤éæœ‰æº)
  • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$ u(r,\theta) = \frac{A_0}{2} + \sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{1}{r^n} (A_n \cos n\theta + B_n \sin n\theta) $$

3. åœ†ç¯é—®é¢˜ ($a < r < b$)

  • å»é™¤é¡¹ï¼š æ— ã€‚æ‰€æœ‰é¡¹éƒ½ä¿ç•™ã€‚
  • è§£çš„å½¢å¼ï¼š $$ u(r,\theta) = A_0 + B_0 \ln r + \sum_{n=1}^\infty (C_n r^n + D_n r^{-n})(A_n \cos n\theta + B_n \sin n\theta) $$

ç»ˆæé€ŸæŸ¥è¡¨ (Cheat Sheet)

æ–¹ç¨‹ä¸åæ ‡ å…³é”®ç‰¹å¾ è§£çš„ä¸»è¦å½¢å¼ (çº§æ•°é¡¹) å¤‡æ³¨
å¼¦æŒ¯åŠ¨ (1D) æ³¢åŠ¨ $T(t) \cdot X(x)$ $X(x)$ å®šåŸºåº•ï¼Œ$T(t)$ æ˜¯æ­£ä½™å¼¦
çƒ­ä¼ å¯¼ (1D) æ‰©æ•£ $T(t) \cdot X(x)$ $X(x)$ å®šåŸºåº•ï¼Œ$T(t)$ æ˜¯æŒ‡æ•°è¡°å‡
æ‹‰æ™®æ‹‰æ–¯ (ç›´è§’) ç¨³æ€ Trig(é½æ¬¡å‘) $\cdot$ Hyperbolic(éé½æ¬¡å‘) ä¸€è¾¹ $\sin$ï¼Œå¦ä¸€è¾¹ $\sinh/\cosh$
æ‹‰æ™®æ‹‰æ–¯ (åœ†å†…) æåæ ‡ $r^n \cdot (A\cos + B\sin)$ å»æ‰ $r^{-n}$ å’Œ $\ln r$
æ‹‰æ™®æ‹‰æ–¯ (åœ†å¤–) æåæ ‡ $r^{-n} \cdot (A\cos + B\sin)$ å»æ‰ $r^n$

åšé¢˜å¥—è·¯æ€»ç»“ï¼š

  1. å®šæ–¹ç¨‹ï¼š å†³å®šäº†æ—¶é—´é¡¹ ($T$) è¿˜æ˜¯åŒæ›²é¡¹ ($Y$)ã€‚
  2. çœ‹è¾¹ç•Œ (x/é½æ¬¡æ–¹å‘)ï¼š
    • $0, 0 \rightarrow \sin$
    • $0’, 0’ \rightarrow \cos$ (æ³¨æ„ $n=0$ å¸¸æ•°é¡¹)
    • $0, 0’ \rightarrow \sin((n+0.5)\dots)$
  3. çœ‹åŒºåŸŸ (æåæ ‡)ï¼š
    • æœ‰åœ†å¿ƒ $\rightarrow$ ç•™ $r^n$
    • æœ‰æ— ç©· $\rightarrow$ ç•™ $r^{-n}$

import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from scipy.interpolate import make_interp_spline
from typing import List, Dict, Tuple, Optional

# --- è®¾ç½®Matplotlibæ”¯æŒä¸­æ–‡æ˜¾ç¤º ---
plt.rcParams['font.sans-serif'] = ['WenQuanYi Zen Hei']
plt.rcParams['axes.unicode_minus'] = False

def plot_multiple_datasets_non_monotonic(
 datasets: List[Dict],
 x_label: str,
 y_label: str,
 title: str,
 smooth_method: str = 'spline',
 poly_degree: int = 3,
 save_path: str = None,
 figsize: Tuple[int, int] = (10, 6),
 colors: Optional[List[str]] = None,
 markers: Optional[List[str]] = None
):
 """
 ä¸€ä¸ªæ”¯æŒå¤šç»„æ•°æ®åŒæ—¶ç»˜åˆ¶çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åœ¨åŒä¸€å¼ å›¾ä¸Šæ˜¾ç¤ºå¤šç»„å®éªŒæ•°æ®ã€‚
 æ­¤ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¯æŒéé€’å¢ï¼ˆéå•è°ƒï¼‰çš„xè½´æ•°æ®ã€‚

 å‚æ•°:
 datasets (List[Dict]): æ•°æ®é›†åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå­—å…¸åŒ…å«:
 - 'x_data': xè½´æ•°æ®
 - 'y_data': yè½´æ•°æ®
 - 'label': è¯¥ç»„æ•°æ®çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°
 - 'smooth_method': (å¯é€‰) è¯¥ç»„æ•°æ®ä½¿ç”¨çš„å¹³æ»‘æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€è®¾ç½®
 - 'poly_degree': (å¯é€‰) è¯¥ç»„æ•°æ®çš„å¤šé¡¹å¼é˜¶æ•°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨å…¨å±€è®¾ç½®
 x_label (str): xè½´çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°ï¼ˆåŒ…å«å•ä½ï¼‰
 y_label (str): yè½´çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°ï¼ˆåŒ…å«å•ä½ï¼‰
 title (str): å›¾è¡¨çš„æ ‡é¢˜
 smooth_method (str): é»˜è®¤å¹³æ»‘æ›²çº¿çš„æ–¹æ³• ('spline', 'polyfit' æˆ– 'univariate_spline')
 poly_degree (int): é»˜è®¤å¤šé¡¹å¼é˜¶æ•°
 save_path (str): å›¾ç‰‡ä¿å­˜è·¯å¾„
 figsize (Tuple[int, int]): å›¾è¡¨å¤§å°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ (10, 6)
 colors (List[str]): è‡ªå®šä¹‰é¢œè‰²åˆ—è¡¨
 markers (List[str]): è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ ‡è®°æ ·å¼åˆ—è¡¨
 """
 # è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤é¢œè‰²å’Œæ ‡è®°æ ·å¼
 if colors is None:
 colors = ['blue', 'red', 'green', 'orange', 'purple', 'brown', 'pink', 'gray', 'olive', 'cyan']
 if markers is None:
 markers = ['o', 's', '^', 'D', 'v', '<', '>', 'p', '*', 'h']

 # åˆ›å»ºå›¾è¡¨
 plt.figure(figsize=figsize)

 for i, dataset in enumerate(datasets):
 # è·å–æ•°æ®
 x = np.array(dataset['x_data'])
 y = np.array(dataset['y_data'])
 label = dataset['label']

 # ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥ç»„æ•°æ®çš„è®¾ç½®æˆ–å…¨å±€è®¾ç½®
 method = dataset.get('smooth_method', smooth_method)
 degree = dataset.get('poly_degree', poly_degree)

 # é€‰æ‹©é¢œè‰²å’Œæ ‡è®°
 color = colors[i % len(colors)]
 marker = markers[i % len(markers)]

 # ç»˜åˆ¶åŸå§‹æ•°æ®ç‚¹
 plt.scatter(x, y, label=f'{label} (åŸå§‹æ•°æ®)', color=color, marker=marker, zorder=5)

 # ç”Ÿæˆå¹³æ»‘æ›²çº¿
 x_smooth = np.linspace(x.min(), x.max(), 300)

 if method == 'spline':
 # æ£€æŸ¥xè½´æ•°æ®æ˜¯å¦å•è°ƒé€’å¢
 is_monotonic = np.all(np.diff(x) > 0)

 if is_monotonic:
 # å¦‚æœæ•°æ®æ˜¯å•è°ƒé€’å¢çš„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨åŸå§‹æ–¹æ³•
 try:
 spline = make_interp_spline(x, y, k=3)
 y_smooth = spline(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)
 except:
 # å¦‚æœæ ·æ¡æ’å€¼å¤±è´¥ï¼Œå›é€€åˆ°å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆ
 print(f"è­¦å‘Š: {label}çš„æ ·æ¡æ’å€¼å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆä»£æ›¿")
 coeffs = np.polyfit(x, y, deg=degree)
 poly_func = np.poly1d(coeffs)
 y_smooth = poly_func(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)
 else:
 # å¦‚æœæ•°æ®ä¸æ˜¯å•è°ƒé€’å¢çš„ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨UnivariateSpline
 try:
 from scipy.interpolate import UnivariateSpline
 # é¦–å…ˆå¯¹xè½´æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
 sort_indices = np.argsort(x)
 x_sorted = x[sort_indices]
 y_sorted = y[sort_indices]

 # ä½¿ç”¨UnivariateSplineå¤„ç†éå•è°ƒæ•°æ®
 spline = UnivariateSpline(x_sorted, y_sorted, s=0)
 y_smooth = spline(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)
 except:
 # å¦‚æœUnivariateSplineä¹Ÿå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå›é€€åˆ°å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆ
 print(f"è­¦å‘Š: {label}çš„UnivariateSplineæ’å€¼å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆä»£æ›¿")
 coeffs = np.polyfit(x, y, deg=degree)
 poly_func = np.poly1d(coeffs)
 y_smooth = poly_func(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)

 elif method == 'polyfit':
 # ä½¿ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆ
 coeffs = np.polyfit(x, y, deg=degree)
 poly_func = np.poly1d(coeffs)
 y_smooth = poly_func(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)
 print(f"{label}çš„å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆæ–¹ç¨‹:\n{poly_func}\n")
 elif method == 'univariate_spline':
 # ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨UnivariateSplineæ–¹æ³•
 try:
 from scipy.interpolate import UnivariateSpline
 # é¦–å…ˆå¯¹xè½´æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
 sort_indices = np.argsort(x)
 x_sorted = x[sort_indices]
 y_sorted = y[sort_indices]

 spline = UnivariateSpline(x_sorted, y_sorted, s=0)
 y_smooth = spline(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='-', alpha=0.8)
 except:
 # å¦‚æœUnivariateSplineå¤±è´¥ï¼Œå›é€€åˆ°å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆ
 print(f"è­¦å‘Š: {label}çš„UnivariateSplineæ’å€¼å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å¤šé¡¹å¼æ‹Ÿåˆä»£æ›¿")
 coeffs = np.polyfit(x, y, deg=degree)
 poly_func = np.poly1d(coeffs)
 y_smooth = poly_func(x_smooth)
 plt.plot(x_smooth, y_smooth, color=color, linewidth=2, linestyle='--', alpha=0.8)

 # æ·»åŠ å›¾è¡¨å…ƒç´ 
 plt.title(title, fontsize=16, fontweight='bold')
 plt.xlabel(x_label, fontsize=12)
 plt.ylabel(y_label, fontsize=12)
 plt.grid(True, linestyle='--', alpha=0.6)
 plt.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc='upper left') # å°†å›¾ä¾‹æ”¾åœ¨å›¾è¡¨å¤–éƒ¨

 # è°ƒæ•´å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢æ ‡ç­¾è¢«è£åˆ‡
 plt.tight_layout()

 # ä¿å­˜å›¾è¡¨
 if save_path:
 plt.savefig(save_path, dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
 print(f"å›¾è¡¨å·²ä¿å­˜è‡³: {save_path}")

 plt.show()

def plot_comparison_chart_non_monotonic(
 datasets: List[Dict],
 x_label: str,
 y_label: str,
 title: str,
 save_path: str = None,
 plot_type: str = 'line'
):
 """
 ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆçš„å¤šç»„æ•°æ®å¯¹æ¯”å›¾å‡½æ•°ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¿«é€Ÿå¯¹æ¯”ã€‚
 æ­¤ç‰ˆæœ¬æ”¯æŒéé€’å¢ï¼ˆéå•è°ƒï¼‰çš„xè½´æ•°æ®ã€‚

 å‚æ•°:
 datasets (List[Dict]): æ•°æ®é›†åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå­—å…¸åŒ…å«:
 - 'x_data': xè½´æ•°æ®
 - 'y_data': yè½´æ•°æ®
 - 'label': è¯¥ç»„æ•°æ®çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°
 x_label (str): xè½´çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°
 y_label (str): yè½´çš„æ ‡ç­¾åç§°
 title (str): å›¾è¡¨çš„æ ‡é¢˜

 plot_type (str): ç»˜å›¾ç±»å‹ ('line' çº¿å›¾, 'bar' æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾, 'scatter' æ•£ç‚¹å›¾)
 """
 plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
 colors = ['blue', 'red', 'green', 'orange', 'purple', 'brown', 'pink', 'gray']

 for i, dataset in enumerate(datasets):
 x = np.array(dataset['x_data'])
 y = np.array(dataset['y_data'])
 label = dataset['label']
 color = colors[i % len(colors)]

 if plot_type == 'line':
 # å¯¹äºçº¿å›¾ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ•°æ®ä¸æ˜¯å•è°ƒçš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦å¯¹æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
 is_monotonic = np.all(np.diff(x) >= 0)
 if not is_monotonic:
 sort_indices = np.argsort(x)
 x_sorted = x[sort_indices]
 y_sorted = y[sort_indices]
 plt.plot(x_sorted, y_sorted, marker='o', label=label, color=color, linewidth=2)
 else:
 plt.plot(x, y, marker='o', label=label, color=color, linewidth=2)
 elif plot_type == 'bar':
 # æŸ±çŠ¶å›¾éœ€è¦ç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ï¼Œç¡®ä¿xè½´æ•°æ®å¯¹é½
 width = 0.8 / len(datasets)
 x_pos = x + (i - len(datasets)/2 + 0.5) * width
 plt.bar(x_pos, y, width, label=label, color=color, alpha=0.7)
 elif plot_type == 'scatter':
 plt.scatter(x, y, label=label, color=color, s=50, alpha=0.7)

 plt.title(title, fontsize=16, fontweight='bold')
 plt.xlabel(x_label, fontsize=12)
 plt.ylabel(y_label, fontsize=12)
 plt.grid(True, linestyle='--', alpha=0.6)
 plt.legend()

 if save_path:
 plt.savefig(save_path, dpi=300, bbox_inches='tight')
 print(f"å›¾è¡¨å·²ä¿å­˜è‡³: {save_path}")

 plt.show()

if __name__ == "__main__":

  1. ç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦åˆ†å¸ƒå¦‚ä½•ä»å·¨æ­£åˆ™ç³»ç»¼æ¨å¯¼ï¼Ÿä¸ºä½•å…è®¸åŒä¸€é‡å­æ€ä¸Šæœ‰ä»»æ„å¤šç²’å­ï¼Ÿ
  2. åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ \( \mu \) å¯¹ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“ä¸ºä½•å¿…é¡»æ»¡è¶³ \( \mu < \varepsilon_0 \)ï¼ˆåŸºæ€èƒ½é‡ï¼‰ï¼Ÿç‰©ç†æ ¹æºæ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ
  3. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆåœ¨ä¸‰ç»´ç†æƒ³ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“ä¸­å­˜åœ¨ç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦å‡èšï¼ˆBECï¼‰ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ï¼Ÿè€Œåœ¨äºŒç»´æˆ–ä¸€ç»´ä¸­ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Ÿ
  4. æ¨å¯¼ä¸‰ç»´è‡ªç”±ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ \( T_c \) è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼Œå¹¶è¯´æ˜å…¶ä¸ç²’å­æ•°å¯†åº¦çš„å…³ç³»ã€‚
  5. æ€å¯†åº¦ \( g(\varepsilon) \propto \varepsilon^{1/2} \) å¦‚ä½•å¯¼è‡´æ€»ç²’å­æ•°ç§¯åˆ†åœ¨ \( \mu \to 0^- \) æ—¶æ”¶æ•›ï¼Ÿ
  6. å¦‚ä½•è®¡ç®— \( T < T_c \) æ—¶å‡èšåˆ°åŸºæ€çš„ç²’å­æ•° \( N_0 \)ï¼Ÿå†™å‡º \( N_0/N \) ä¸ \( T/T_c \) çš„å…³ç³»ã€‚
  7. ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„æ€»èƒ½é‡ \( U \) åœ¨ \( T > T_c \) æ—¶ä¸ºä½•æ­£æ¯”äº \( T^{5/2} \)ï¼Ÿæ¨å¯¼æ­¤å¹‚å¾‹ã€‚
  8. ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„å‹åŠ› \( P \) åœ¨ \( T > T_c \) æ—¶å¦‚ä½•è¡¨è¾¾ï¼Ÿå®ƒä¸ç»å…¸ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“æœ‰ä½•å¼‚åŒï¼Ÿ
  9. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ \( T < T_c \) æ—¶ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„å‹åŠ›ä¸ä½“ç§¯æ— å…³ï¼Ÿè¿™æ˜¯å¦è¿åçƒ­åŠ›å­¦ç›´è§‰ï¼Ÿ
  10. å¦‚ä½•ä»å·¨åŠ¿ \( \Omega \) å‡ºå‘ï¼Œæ¨å¯¼ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„ç†µã€å†…èƒ½å’Œçƒ­å®¹ï¼Ÿ
  11. åœ¨ BEC å‘ç”Ÿæ—¶ï¼ŒåŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ \( \mu \) ä¸ºä½•â€œé’‰æ‰â€åœ¨åŸºæ€èƒ½é‡ï¼ˆé€šå¸¸è®¾ä¸º 0ï¼‰ï¼Ÿ
  12. å¦‚ä½•ç†è§£æ¿€å‘æ€ç²’å­æ•° \( N_{\text{ex}} \) çš„ç§¯åˆ†ä¸Šé™ä¸ºæ— ç©·ï¼Œä½†ç»“æœæœ‰é™ï¼Ÿ
  13. è‹¥è€ƒè™‘ç»è‰²å­å…·æœ‰å°ä½†éé›¶è´¨é‡ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ­£ \( T_c \)ï¼Ÿ
  14. äºŒç»´è‡ªç”±ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“ä¸ºä½•ä¸èƒ½å‘ç”Ÿ BECï¼Ÿä»æ€å¯†åº¦å’Œç²’å­æ•°ç§¯åˆ†å‘æ•£æ€§åˆ†æã€‚
  15. ç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦å‡èšæ˜¯å®è§‚å æ®å•ä¸€é‡å­æ€çš„ç°è±¡ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ç”¨é‡å­ç›¸å¹²æ€§æˆ–åºå‚é‡ç†è§£å…¶æœ¬è´¨ï¼Ÿ

ä¸‰ã€å…‰å­æ°”ä½“ï¼ˆPhoton Gasï¼‰â€” é»‘ä½“è¾å°„ä¸ç»è‰²ç»Ÿè®¡ç‰¹ä¾‹

  1. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå…‰å­æ°”ä½“çš„åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ \( \mu = 0 \)ï¼Ÿè¿™ä¸ç²’å­æ•°ä¸å®ˆæ’æœ‰ä½•å…³ç³»ï¼Ÿ
  2. å…‰å­çš„è‰²æ•£å…³ç³» \( \omega = ck \) å¦‚ä½•å½±å“æ€å¯†åº¦ \( g(\omega) \) çš„å½¢å¼ï¼Ÿæ¨å¯¼ä¸‰ç»´æƒ…å½¢ä¸‹çš„ \( g(\omega) \propto \omega^2 \)ã€‚
  3. å¦‚ä½•ä»æ€å¯†åº¦å’Œç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦åˆ†å¸ƒï¼ˆ\( \mu=0 \)ï¼‰å‡ºå‘ï¼Œæ¨å¯¼æ™®æœ—å…‹é»‘ä½“è¾å°„å…¬å¼ \( u(\omega) \)ï¼Ÿ
  4. æ¨å¯¼æ–¯ç‰¹è—©-ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼å®šå¾‹ï¼šæ€»è¾å°„èƒ½é‡å¯†åº¦ \( u \propto T^4 \)ã€‚
  5. æ¨å¯¼ç»´æ©ä½ç§»å®šå¾‹ï¼š\( \lambda_{\text{max}} T = \text{const} \)ã€‚
  6. å…‰å­æ°”ä½“çš„å‹åŠ› \( P \) ä¸ºä½•ç­‰äº \( u/3 \)ï¼Ÿä»åŠ¨é‡æµæˆ–çƒ­åŠ›å­¦å…³ç³»æ¨å¯¼ã€‚
  7. å¦‚ä½•ä»å·¨é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆæˆ–é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°ï¼‰å‡ºå‘ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å…‰å­æ°”ä½“çš„ç†µï¼Œå¹¶è¯æ˜ \( S \propto T^3 V \)ï¼Ÿ
  8. ä¸ºä½•å…‰å­æ°”ä½“ä¸é€‚ç”¨ç²’å­æ•°å®ˆæ’çš„æ­£åˆ™ç³»ç»¼ï¼Œè€Œå¿…é¡»ç”¨å·¨æ­£åˆ™ç³»ç»¼ï¼ˆå°½ç®¡ \( \mu=0 \)ï¼‰ï¼Ÿ
  9. æ¨å¯¼å…‰å­æ°”ä½“çš„çƒ­å®¹ \( C_V \propto T^3 \)ã€‚
  10. åœ¨æ¨å¯¼æ€å¯†åº¦æ—¶ï¼Œä¸ºä½•è¦è€ƒè™‘ä¸¤ç§åæŒ¯æ€ï¼Ÿè¿™å¯¹æœ€ç»ˆç»“æœçš„ç³»æ•°æœ‰ä½•å½±å“ï¼Ÿ
  11. å¦‚ä½•ç†è§£ç©ºè…”è¾å°„è¾¾åˆ°å¹³è¡¡æ—¶ï¼Œå…‰å­æ•°â€œè‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒæ•´â€ï¼Ÿä¸æ™®é€šç»è‰²æ°”ä½“æœ‰ä½•æœ¬è´¨ä¸åŒï¼Ÿ
  12. ä»é‡å­åœºè®ºè§’åº¦çœ‹ï¼Œå…‰å­æ˜¯æ— è´¨é‡ã€è‡ªæ—‹ä¸º 1 çš„ç»è‰²å­ï¼Œè¿™å¦‚ä½•ä½“ç°åœ¨ç»Ÿè®¡è¡Œä¸ºä¸­ï¼Ÿ
  13. è‹¥å°†å…‰å­é™åˆ¶åœ¨äºŒç»´è…”ä½“ä¸­ï¼ˆå¦‚çŸ³å¢¨çƒ¯ä¸­çš„ç±»å…‰å­æ¿€å‘ï¼‰ï¼Œè¾å°„è°±ä¼šå¦‚ä½•å˜åŒ–ï¼Ÿ
  14. æ¨å¯¼å…‰å­æ°”ä½“çš„å·¨åŠ¿ \( \Omega = -PV \)ï¼Œå¹¶è¯´æ˜å…¶ä¸è‡ªç”±èƒ½çš„å…³ç³»ï¼ˆæ³¨æ„ \( N \) ä¸å›ºå®šï¼‰ã€‚
  15. é»‘ä½“è¾å°„è°±æ˜¯å¦ä¾èµ–äºè…”ä½“ææ–™ï¼Ÿä¸ºä½•æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼æ˜¯æ™®é€‚çš„ï¼Ÿ

å››ã€ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼å­ï¼ˆç»å…¸ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“ï¼‰â€” éº¦å…‹æ–¯éŸ¦-ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼ç»Ÿè®¡

  1. éº¦å…‹æ–¯éŸ¦-ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼åˆ†å¸ƒå¦‚ä½•ä»æ­£åˆ™ç³»ç»¼æˆ–å·¨æ­£åˆ™ç³»ç»¼æ¨å¯¼ï¼Ÿä½•æ—¶å¯å¿½ç•¥é‡å­ç»Ÿè®¡æ•ˆåº”ï¼Ÿ
  2. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆç»å…¸æé™æ¡ä»¶æ˜¯ \( e^{\beta(\varepsilon - \mu)} \gg 1 \)ï¼Ÿå¦‚ä½•è½¬åŒ–ä¸º \( n\lambda_T^3 \ll 1 \)ï¼Ÿ
  3. æ¨å¯¼å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° \( Z_1 = \frac{V}{\lambda_T^3} \)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ \( \lambda_T = \sqrt{\frac{2\pi\hbar^2}{mkT}} \) æ˜¯çƒ­æ³¢é•¿ã€‚
  4. å¦‚ä½•ä» \( N \) ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° \( Z_N = Z_1^N / N! \) æ¨å¯¼å‡ºç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“çŠ¶æ€æ–¹ç¨‹ \( PV = NkT \)ï¼Ÿ
  5. æ¨å¯¼ç»å…¸ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“çš„å†…èƒ½ \( U = \frac{3}{2}NkT \) å’Œç†µï¼ˆSackur-Tetrode å…¬å¼ï¼‰ã€‚
  6. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå¿…é¡»åœ¨é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°ä¸­é™¤ä»¥ \( N! \)ï¼Ÿè¿™å¦‚ä½•è§£å†³ Gibbs æ‚–è®ºï¼Ÿ
  7. åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ \( \mu \) åœ¨ç»å…¸æé™ä¸‹ä¸ºä½•ä¸ºè´Ÿä¸”ç»å¯¹å€¼å¾ˆå¤§ï¼Ÿå†™å‡ºå…¶æ˜¾å¼è¡¨è¾¾å¼ã€‚
  8. å¦‚ä½•ä»é€Ÿåº¦åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°æ¨å¯¼å‡ºæœ€æ¦‚ç„¶é€Ÿåº¦ã€å¹³å‡é€Ÿåº¦å’Œæ–¹å‡æ ¹é€Ÿåº¦ï¼Ÿ
  9. ç»å…¸ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“çš„çƒ­å®¹ä¸ºä½•ä¸æ¸©åº¦æ— å…³ï¼Ÿè¿™ä¸é‡å­æ°”ä½“æœ‰ä½•æ ¹æœ¬åŒºåˆ«ï¼Ÿ
  10. æ¨å¯¼ç†µçš„å¹¿å»¶æ€§ï¼Œå¹¶è¯´æ˜ Sackur-Tetrode å…¬å¼å¦‚ä½•ä½“ç°é‡å­åŠ›å­¦ä¿®æ­£ï¼ˆé€šè¿‡ \( \hbar \)ï¼‰ã€‚
  11. åœ¨ç›¸ç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªé‡å­æ€å æ®çš„ä½“ç§¯ä¸ºä½•æ˜¯ \( h^3 \)ï¼Ÿè¿™å¦‚ä½•å‡ºç°åœ¨é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°çš„ç§¯åˆ†ä¸­ï¼Ÿ
  12. å¦‚ä½•ä»å·¨é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° \( \Xi = \exp(e^{\beta\mu} Z_1) \) æ¨å¯¼å‡ºå¹³å‡ç²’å­æ•°å’Œæ¶¨è½ï¼Ÿ
  13. ç»å…¸æé™ä¸‹ï¼Œè´¹ç±³/ç»è‰²åˆ†å¸ƒä¸ºä½•éƒ½è¶‹è¿‘äº \( e^{-\beta(\varepsilon - \mu)} \)ï¼Ÿ
  14. è‹¥ç²’å­å…·æœ‰å†…éƒ¨è‡ªç”±åº¦ï¼ˆå¦‚è½¬åŠ¨ã€æŒ¯åŠ¨ï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ”¹é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°å¹¶è®¡ç®—çƒ­å®¹ï¼Ÿ
  15. ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆç»å…¸ç»Ÿè®¡æ— æ³•è§£é‡Šä½æ¸©ä¸‹çƒ­å®¹çš„ä¸‹é™ï¼Ÿè¿™æ­ç¤ºäº†ä»€ä¹ˆç‰©ç†å±€é™ï¼Ÿ

è¿™äº›é—®é¢˜è¦†ç›–äº†ä»å¾®è§‚ç»Ÿè®¡å‡è®¾ â†’ é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°æ„å»º â†’ åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•° â†’ çƒ­åŠ›å­¦é‡æ¨å¯¼ â†’ æç«¯æ¡ä»¶è¡Œä¸ºçš„å®Œæ•´é€»è¾‘é“¾ã€‚å»ºè®®ä½ åœ¨å¤ä¹ æ—¶ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©å…¶ä¸­è‹¥å¹²å…³é”®é—®é¢˜ï¼ˆå¦‚ç®€å¹¶å‹ã€BEC ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ã€é»‘ä½“è¾å°„è°±ã€Sackur-Tetrode ç†µï¼‰åŠ¨æ‰‹å®Œæ•´æ¨å¯¼ä¸€éï¼Œä»¥æ‰“é€šçŸ¥è¯†è„‰ç»œã€‚

#include "xil_printf.h"
#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xparameters_ps.h"
#include "xspips.h"
#include "xspips_hw.h"
#include "sleep.h"

#define prescaler 16
#define data_length 16
#define data_count data_length/8


int main(void){
 xil_printf("0");
XSpiPs_Config* spi_config=XSpiPs_LookupConfig(XPAR_SPI0_BASEADDR);
XSpiPs spi;
XSpiPs_CfgInitialize(&spi,spi_config,XPAR_SPI0_BASEADDR);

u32 options=XSPIPS_MASTER_OPTION|XSPIPS_CLK_ACTIVE_LOW_OPTION|XSPIPS_CLK_PHASE_1_OPTION;
XSpiPs_SetOptions(&spi,options);
xil_printf("a");
XSpiPs_SetClkPrescaler(&spi,XSPIPS_CLK_PRESCALE_16);
xil_printf("b");
//dac data
u16 mode1=0b1100;
u16 data1=1024;
// high voltage
u16 send1=(mode1<<12)|(data1);
u8 send1_buf[2];
send1_buf[0]=send1>>8;
send1_buf[1]=send1&0xff;
u8 sleep_time=1;
// low voltage
u16 data2=0;
u16 send2=(mode1<<12)|(data2);
u8 send2_buf[2];
send2_buf[0]=send2>>8;
send2_buf[1]=send2&0xff;
XSpiPs_Enable(&spi);
XSpiPs_SetSlaveSelect(&spi,0x00);
xil_printf("1");
while(1){
 //sleep(1);
 sleep(sleep_time);
 //XSpiPs_SetSlaveSelect(&spi,0x01);
 XSpiPs_Enable(&spi);
 XSpiPs_PolledTransfer(&spi, send1_buf, NULL, 2);
 // xil_printf("2");
 // XSpiPs_Transfer(&spi, send1_buf, NULL, 2);
 //sleep(1);
 sleep(sleep_time);
 XSpiPs_Enable(&spi);
 // XSpiPs_SetSlaveSelect(&spi,0x01);
 XSpiPs_PolledTransfer(&spi, send2_buf, NULL, 2);
 //xil_printf("3");
 //XSpiPs_Transfer(&spi, send2_buf, NULL, 2);
}

}

item.title: ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼ç»Ÿè®¡
item.description:
å¥½çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŒ‰ç…§è¿™ä¸ªæ€è·¯é‡æ–°æ•´ç†ä¸€ä»½æ›´èšç„¦äºå…¬å¼å’Œå…·ä½“è®¡ç®—ç»“è®ºçš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚

ä¸€ã€ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼ç»Ÿè®¡çš„é€‚ç”¨èŒƒå›´

  • é€‚ç”¨ä½“ç³»ï¼šç”±å¤§é‡ã€å¼±ç›¸äº’ä½œç”¨ã€ç»å…¸å¯åˆ†è¾¨çš„ç²’å­ç»„æˆçš„å®è§‚ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚
  • é€‚ç”¨æ¡ä»¶ï¼šé«˜æ¸©ã€ä½å¯†åº¦ï¼Œå³å¤„äºéç®€å¹¶çŠ¶æ€ ($n\lambda_T^3 \ll 1$)ã€‚

äºŒã€æ ¸å¿ƒå·¥å…·ï¼šé…åˆ†å‡½æ•° Z (The Master Key)

  • å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° (èƒ½çº§æ±‚å’Œ):

    $$ z = \sum_s g_s e^{-\beta \epsilon_s} \quad (\text{å…¶ä¸­} \beta = \frac{1}{k_B T}) $$

  • å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° (èƒ½é‡ç§¯åˆ†):

    $$ z = \int_0^\infty g(E) e^{-\beta E} dE \quad (g(E) \text{æ˜¯èƒ½æ€å¯†åº¦}) $$

  • N ç²’å­ä½“ç³»é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°:

    • å¯åˆ†è¾¨ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿ (å¦‚å›ºä½“åŸå­)ï¼š$Z = z^N$
    • ä¸å¯åˆ†è¾¨ç²’å­ç³»ç»Ÿ (å¦‚æ°”ä½“åˆ†å­)ï¼š$Z = \frac{z^N}{N!}$ (ä¿®æ­£å‰å¸ƒæ–¯ä½¯è°¬)

ä¸‰ã€ç”±é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°å¯¼å‡ºä¸€åˆ‡çƒ­åŠ›å­¦é‡

ä¸€æ—¦æ±‚å‡ºæ€»é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° Zï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å®è§‚é‡éƒ½å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹å…¬å¼è®¡ç®—å¾—å‡ºã€‚è¿™æ˜¯æœ€é‡è¦çš„è®¡ç®—æ¡¥æ¢ã€‚

  • äº¥å§†éœå…¹è‡ªç”±èƒ½ F:

    $$ F = -k_B T \ln Z $$

  • ç†µ S:

    $$ S = -(\frac{\partial F}{\partial T})_{V,N} = k_B \ln Z + k_B T (\frac{\partial \ln Z}{\partial T})_{V,N} $$

    (æˆ–è€…ç”¨ $S=(U-F)/T$ æ›´æ–¹ä¾¿)

  • å‹å¼º P:

    $$ P = -(\frac{\partial F}{\partial V})_{T,N} = k_B T (\frac{\partial \ln Z}{\partial V})_{T,N} $$

  • å†…èƒ½ U:

    $$ U = -(\frac{\partial \ln Z}{\partial \beta})_{V,N} = N k_B T^2 \frac{\partial \ln z}{\partial T} $$

  • çƒ­å®¹ $C_V$:

    $$ C_V = (\frac{\partial U}{\partial T})_{V,N} $$

  • åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ $\mu$:

    $$ \mu = (\frac{\partial F}{\partial N})_{T,V} = -k_B T (\frac{\partial \ln Z}{\partial N})_{T,V} $$

å››ã€éº¦å…‹æ–¯éŸ¦é€Ÿç‡/é€Ÿåº¦åˆ†å¸ƒå¾‹ (å…¬å¼é›†)

è¿™æ˜¯ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼åˆ†å¸ƒåœ¨ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“å¹³åŠ¨ä¸Šçš„å…·ä½“åº”ç”¨ã€‚

  1. éº¦å…‹æ–¯éŸ¦é€Ÿç‡åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•° $f(v)$: (væ˜¯é€Ÿç‡ï¼Œ$v \in [0, \infty)$)

    $$ f(v) = 4\pi (\frac{m}{2\pi k_B T})^{3/2} v^2 e^{-mv^2 / 2k_B T} $$

    å½’ä¸€åŒ–æ¡ä»¶: $\int_0^\infty f(v) dv = 1$

  2. ä¸‰ç§ç‰¹å¾é€Ÿç‡:

    • æœ€æ¦‚ç„¶é€Ÿç‡ $v_p$ (å³°å€¼é€Ÿç‡): $$ v_p = \sqrt{\frac{2k_B T}{m}} $$
    • å¹³å‡é€Ÿç‡ $\bar{v}$ (ç»Ÿè®¡å¹³å‡): $$ \bar{v} = \sqrt{\frac{8k_B T}{\pi m}} $$
    • æ–¹å‡æ ¹é€Ÿç‡ $v_{rms}$ (ä¸å¹³å‡åŠ¨èƒ½ç›¸å…³): $$ v_{rms} = \sqrt{\frac{3k_B T}{m}} $$ å¤§å°å…³ç³» (å¸¸è€ƒé€‰æ‹©é¢˜): $v_p < \bar{v} < v_{rms}$

äº”ã€ç†æƒ³æ°”ä½“åˆ†å­è‡ªç”±åº¦çš„çƒ­åŠ›å­¦æ€§è´¨ (å…¬å¼é›†)

1. å¹³åŠ¨è‡ªç”±åº¦ (é€‚ç”¨äºæ‰€æœ‰æ°”ä½“)

  • å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°: $$ z_{tr} = V (\frac{2\pi m k_B T}{h^2})^{3/2} \propto V T^{3/2} $$
  • å†…èƒ½: $$ U_{tr} = \frac{3}{2} N k_B T $$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_{V, tr} = \frac{3}{2} N k_B $$
  • ç†µ (Sackur-Tetrode å…¬å¼): $$ S_{tr} = N k_B [\ln(\frac{V}{N}) + \frac{3}{2}\ln T + \frac{3}{2}\ln(\frac{2\pi m k_B}{h^2}) + \frac{5}{2}] $$

2. è½¬åŠ¨è‡ªç”±åº¦ (é€‚ç”¨äºåŒåŸå­æˆ–å¤šåŸå­åˆ†å­)

  • å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° (é«˜æ¸©è¿‘ä¼¼): $$ z_{rot} \approx \frac{2I k_B T}{\sigma \hbar^2} \propto T \quad (I \text{ä¸ºè½¬åŠ¨æƒ¯é‡}, \sigma \text{ä¸ºå¯¹ç§°å› å­, åŒåŸå­}\sigma=2) $$
  • å†…èƒ½: $$ U_{rot} = N k_B T $$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_{V, rot} = N k_B $$
  • ç†µ: $$ S_{rot} = N k_B [\ln z_{rot} + 1] $$

3. æŒ¯åŠ¨è‡ªç”±åº¦ (é«˜æ¸©ä¸‹åŒåŸå­æˆ–å¤šåŸå­åˆ†å­)

  • å•ç²’å­é…åˆ†å‡½æ•° (è°æŒ¯å­æ¨¡å‹): $$ z_{vib} = \frac{1}{1-e^{-\hbar\omega/k_B T}} = \frac{e^{-\Theta_v/2T}}{1-e^{-\Theta_v/T}} \quad (\Theta_v=\hbar\omega/k_B \text{æ˜¯æŒ¯åŠ¨ç‰¹å¾æ¸©åº¦}) $$
  • å†…èƒ½ (èƒ½é‡é›¶ç‚¹å–åœ¨åŸºæ€ $\frac{1}{2}\hbar\omega$): $$ U_{vib} = N \frac{\hbar\omega}{e^{\hbar\omega/k_B T} - 1} $$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_{V, vib} = N k_B (\frac{\hbar\omega}{k_B T})^2 \frac{e^{\hbar\omega/k_B T}}{(e^{\hbar\omega/k_B T}-1)^2} = N k_B (\frac{\Theta_v}{T})^2 \frac{e^{\Theta_v/T}}{(e^{\Theta_v/T}-1)^2} $$
    • é«˜æ¸©æé™ ($T \gg \Theta_v$): $C_{V, vib} \to N k_B$
    • ä½æ¸©æé™ ($T \ll \Theta_v$): $C_{V, vib} \to 0$
  • ç†µ: $$ S_{vib} = N k_B [-\ln(1-e^{-\Theta_v/T}) + \frac{\Theta_v}{T}\frac{1}{e^{\Theta_v/T}-1}] $$

å…­ã€å›ºä½“çƒ­å®¹ (å…¬å¼é›†)

1. ç»å…¸æœéš†-ç€æ›¿å®šå¾‹

  • æ¨¡å‹: N ä¸ªåŸå­åœ¨æ™¶æ ¼ä¸Šåšä¸‰ç»´ç®€è°æŒ¯åŠ¨ï¼ŒæŒ‰èƒ½é‡å‡åˆ†å®šç†å¤„ç†ã€‚
  • å†…èƒ½: $U = 3N k_B T$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_V = 3 N k_B \approx 3R \quad (\text{å¯¹ 1 æ‘©å°”å›ºä½“}) $$
  • ç»“è®º: ç»å…¸ç†è®ºé¢„è¨€çƒ­å®¹ä¸ºå¸¸æ•°ï¼Œä¸é«˜æ¸©å®éªŒç›¸ç¬¦ï¼Œä½†åœ¨ä½æ¸©ä¸‹å¤±æ•ˆã€‚

2. çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦æ¨¡å‹

  • æ¨¡å‹: N ä¸ªåŸå­çœ‹ä½œ 3N ä¸ªé¢‘ç‡ç›¸åŒ ($\omega_E$) çš„ã€ç‹¬ç«‹çš„é‡å­è°æŒ¯å­ã€‚
  • é…åˆ†å‡½æ•°: $Z = (z_{vib, 1D})^{3N}$
  • å†…èƒ½: $$ U = 3N \frac{\hbar\omega_E}{e^{\hbar\omega_E/k_B T}-1} $$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_V = 3 N k_B (\frac{\Theta_E}{T})^2 \frac{e^{\Theta_E/T}}{(e^{\Theta_E/T}-1)^2} \quad (\Theta_E=\hbar\omega_E/k_B \text{æ˜¯çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦æ¸©åº¦}) $$
  • ç»“è®º:
    • é«˜æ¸©æé™ ($T \gg \Theta_E$): $C_V \to 3N k_B$ (ç¬¦åˆæœéš†-ç€æ›¿å®šå¾‹)ã€‚
    • ä½æ¸©æé™ ($T \ll \Theta_E$): $C_V \propto e^{-\Theta_E/T}$ (æŒ‡æ•°å½¢å¼ä¸‹é™)ï¼Œèƒ½è§£é‡Šçƒ­å®¹è¶‹äº0ï¼Œä½†ä¸å®éªŒçš„ $T^3$ è§„å¾‹ä¸ç¬¦ã€‚

3. å¾·æ‹œæ¨¡å‹

  • æ¨¡å‹: æŠŠæ™¶æ ¼æŒ¯åŠ¨çœ‹ä½œæ™¶ä½“ä¸­çš„å¼¹æ€§æ³¢ï¼ˆå£°å­ï¼‰ï¼Œæœ‰é¢‘ç‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œä¸”æœ‰æœ€é«˜æˆªæ­¢é¢‘ç‡ $\omega_D$ (å¾·æ‹œé¢‘ç‡)ã€‚
  • æ€å¯†åº¦: $g(\omega) = \frac{9N}{\omega_D^3}\omega^2 \quad (0 \le \omega \le \omega_D)$
  • å†…èƒ½ (ç§¯åˆ†å½¢å¼): $$ U = \int_0^{\omega_D} \frac{\hbar\omega}{e^{\hbar\omega/k_B T}-1} g(\omega) d\omega $$
  • çƒ­å®¹: $$ C_V = 9N k_B (\frac{T}{\Theta_D})^3 \int_0^{\Theta_D/T} \frac{x^4 e^x}{(e^x-1)^2} dx \quad (x=\hbar\omega/k_BT, \Theta_D=\hbar\omega_D/k_B \text{æ˜¯å¾·æ‹œæ¸©åº¦}) $$
  • ç»“è®º (æœ€é‡è¦):
    • é«˜æ¸©æé™ ($T \gg \Theta_D$): $C_V \to 3N k_B$ (ç¬¦åˆæœéš†-ç€æ›¿å®šå¾‹)ã€‚
    • ä½æ¸©æé™ ($T \ll \Theta_D$): $$ C_V = \frac{12\pi^4}{5} N k_B (\frac{T}{\Theta_D})^3 \propto T^3 $$ è¿™å°±æ˜¯å¾·æ‹œ $T^3$ å®šå¾‹ï¼Œä¸ä½æ¸©å®éªŒç¬¦åˆå¾—éå¸¸å¥½ã€‚

item.title: ç»è‰²å’Œè´¹ç±³å­å¤ä¹
item.description:
å¥½çš„ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥æ„å»ºä¸€ä»½ä»¥å…¬å¼ä¸ºéª¨æ¶ï¼Œè¾…ä»¥ç‰©ç†å›¾åƒå’Œæ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯çš„é‡å­ç»Ÿè®¡æ ¸å¿ƒç¬”è®°ã€‚è¿™ä»½ææ–™å°†èšç„¦äºç»è‰²å­ã€å…‰å­å’Œè´¹ç±³å­è¿™ä¸‰å¤§å®¶æ—ã€‚

åŸºç¡€å‰ç½®ï¼šæ€å¯†åº¦å‡½æ•° (DOS) $g(E)$

æ€å¯†åº¦æ˜¯è®¡ç®—ä¸€åˆ‡å®è§‚é‡çš„åœ°åŸºï¼Œå®ƒæè¿°äº†ç³»ç»Ÿåœ¨èƒ½é‡ç©ºé—´ä¸­â€œç©ºæˆ¿é—´â€çš„åˆ†å¸ƒæƒ…å†µã€‚

ç‰©ç†å›¾åƒ

æƒ³è±¡ä¸€åº§èƒ½é‡æ—…é¦†ã€‚æ€å¯†åº¦ $g(E)$ å‘Šè¯‰ä½ åœ¨èƒ½é‡ä¸º $E$ çš„æ¥¼å±‚ä¸Šï¼Œå•ä½èƒ½é‡é«˜åº¦å†…æœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªå¯ä¾›å…¥ä½çš„æˆ¿é—´ï¼ˆé‡å­æ€ï¼‰ã€‚å®ƒåªå…³å¿ƒæœ‰å¤šå°‘æˆ¿é—´ï¼Œè€Œä¸å…³å¿ƒæ˜¯å¦æœ‰äººå…¥ä½ï¼ˆé‚£æ˜¯ç”±åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°å†³å®šçš„ï¼‰ã€‚

  • å¯¹äºæ™®é€šç²’å­ï¼Œèƒ½é‡è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œ$E$ æ¥¼å±‚é™„è¿‘çš„æˆ¿é—´å°±è¶Šå¤šã€‚
  • å¯¹äºå…‰å­ï¼Œèƒ½é‡è¶Šé«˜çš„æ¥¼å±‚ï¼Œæˆ¿é—´æ•°é‡å¢é•¿å¾—æ›´å¿«ã€‚

æ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯

  1. kç©ºé—´é‡å­åŒ–: å°†ç²’å­é™åˆ¶åœ¨ä½“ç§¯ä¸º $V=L^3$ çš„ç›’å­é‡Œï¼Œå…¶æ³¢çŸ¢ $\vec{k}$ æ˜¯é‡å­åŒ–çš„ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªå…è®¸çš„kç‚¹åœ¨kç©ºé—´å æ®çš„ä½“ç§¯ä¸º $(2\pi/L)^3 = (2\pi)^3/V$ã€‚
  2. kç©ºé—´æ€å¯†åº¦: åœ¨kç©ºé—´ä¸­ï¼Œå•ä½ä½“ç§¯å†…çš„æ€ç‚¹æ•°ä¸º $V/(2\pi)^3$ã€‚
  3. çƒå£³å†…çš„æ€æ•°: åŠå¾„ä» $k$åˆ° $k+dk$ çš„çƒå£³ä½“ç§¯ä¸º $4\pi k^2 dk$ã€‚æ­¤çƒå£³å†…çš„æ€»æ€æ•°ä¸º $dN = g_s \cdot \frac{V}{(2\pi)^3} \cdot 4\pi k^2 dk$ ($g_s$æ˜¯è‡ªæ—‹ç®€å¹¶åº¦)ã€‚
  4. èƒ½é‡è½¬æ¢: åˆ©ç”¨èƒ½é‡-åŠ¨é‡å…³ç³» $E(k)$ï¼Œé€šè¿‡é“¾å¼æ³•åˆ™ $g(E)dE = dN$ï¼Œæ±‚å¾— $g(E) = dN/dE$ã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒå…¬å¼

  1. æœ‰è´¨é‡çš„éç›¸å¯¹è®ºç²’å­ (ç”µå­ã€ç»è‰²åŸå­): $E=p^2/2m = \hbar^2 k^2/2m$

    • hbar (Ä§) å½¢å¼: $$ g(E) = V \frac{g_s}{4\pi^2} (\frac{2m}{\hbar^2})^{3/2} \sqrt{E} $$
    • h å½¢å¼ ($h=2\pi\hbar$): $$ g(E) = V g_s \frac{4\pi m}{h^3}\sqrt{2mE} $$ å…³é”®ç»“è®º: $g(E) \propto \sqrt{E}$

  2. æ— è´¨é‡çš„ç›¸å¯¹è®ºæ€§ç²’å­ (å…‰å­ã€å£°å­): $E=pc = \hbar k c$

    • hbar (Ä§) å½¢å¼: $$ g(E) = V \frac{g_s}{2\pi^2 c^3 \hbar^3} E^2 $$
    • h å½¢å¼: $$ g(E) = V g_s \frac{8\pi}{c^3 h^3} E^2 $$ å…³é”®ç»“è®º: $g(E) \propto E^2$

1. ç†æƒ³ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“

1.1 åŸºæœ¬æ€§è´¨ä¸åˆ†å¸ƒ

  • ç²’å­: éµå¾ªç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦ç»Ÿè®¡çš„æ•´æ•°è‡ªæ—‹ç²’å­ (ç»è‰²å­)ï¼Œå…¨åŒä¸å¯åˆ†è¾¨ã€‚
  • åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°: æè¿°èƒ½é‡ä¸ºEçš„æ€è¢«ç²’å­å æ®çš„å¹³å‡æ•°ã€‚ $$ f_{BE}(E) = \frac{1}{e^{(E-\mu)/k_B T} - 1} $$ åˆ†æ¯ä¸­çš„ -1 ä½“ç°äº†ç»è‰²å­â€œå–œæ¬¢æ‰å †â€çš„å€¾å‘ã€‚
  • åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ $\mu$: ç²’å­æ•°å®ˆæ’ï¼Œä½†å¿…é¡»æ»¡è¶³ $\mu \le E_{min}$ã€‚é€šå¸¸å–åŸºæ€èƒ½é‡ $E_0=0$ï¼Œåˆ™ $\mu \le 0$ã€‚å¦åˆ™åŸºæ€å æ®æ•°ä¼šä¸ºè´Ÿï¼Œæ— ç‰©ç†æ„ä¹‰ã€‚

1.2 ç»è‰²-çˆ±å› æ–¯å¦å‡èš (BEC)

ç‰©ç†å›¾åƒ

åœ¨é«˜æ¸©æ—¶ï¼Œç»è‰²å­åƒä¸€ç¾¤ç²¾åŠ›æ—ºç››çš„å­¦ç”Ÿï¼Œåˆ†æ•£åœ¨æ“åœºï¼ˆæ¿€å‘æ€èƒ½çº§ï¼‰çš„å„ä¸ªè§’è½ã€‚å½“æ¸©åº¦é™ä½æ—¶ï¼Œå­¦ç”Ÿä»¬å¼€å§‹çŠ¯æ‡’ï¼Œå€¾å‘äºèšé›†åˆ°æ“åœºé—¨å£ï¼ˆåŸºæ€èƒ½çº§ï¼‰æœ€ä½æ´¼çš„åœ°æ–¹ä¼‘æ¯ã€‚å½“æ¸©åº¦ä½åˆ°ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ $T_C$ æ—¶ï¼Œæ“åœºä¸Šï¼ˆæ¿€å‘æ€ï¼‰å·²ç»å®¹çº³ä¸ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰æƒ³ä¼‘æ¯çš„å­¦ç”Ÿäº†ï¼Œå¤šå‡ºæ¥çš„å­¦ç”Ÿåªèƒ½è¢«è¿«å…¨éƒ¨æŒ¤åœ¨é—¨å£é‚£ä¸€ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼ˆåŸºæ€ï¼‰ä¸Šï¼Œå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªå¯†åº¦æé«˜çš„â€œäººå †â€ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªå®è§‚æ•°é‡çš„ç²’å­å æ®åŒä¸€ä¸ªé‡å­æ€çš„ç°è±¡å°±æ˜¯BECã€‚

å…³é”®ç»“è®ºä¸å…¬å¼

  1. BECå‘ç”Ÿæ¡ä»¶: å½“æ¸©åº¦ $T$ é™ä½åˆ°ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ $T_C$ ä»¥ä¸‹æ—¶ï¼Œæ¿€å‘æ€èƒ½çº§â€œé¥±å’Œâ€ï¼Œæ— æ³•å®¹çº³æ‰€æœ‰ç²’å­ã€‚

  2. ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ $T_C$ æ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯:

    • æ€»ç²’å­æ•° $N = N_0 + N_{ex}$ (åŸºæ€ç²’å­æ•° + æ¿€å‘æ€ç²’å­æ•°)ã€‚
    • $N_{ex} = \int_0^\infty f_{BE}(E) g(E) dE$ã€‚
    • å½“æ¸©åº¦ä»é«˜å¤„é™è‡³ $T_C$ æ—¶ï¼ŒåŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ $\mu$ æ°å¥½è¶‹è¿‘äº0ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶æ¿€å‘æ€æ‰€èƒ½å®¹çº³çš„ç²’å­æ•°è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§å€¼ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªå€¼å°±ç­‰äºç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ€»ç²’å­æ•° $N$ã€‚
    • ä»¤ $\mu=0$ï¼Œå¸¦å…¥ $g(E) \propto \sqrt{E}$ æ±‚è§£ç§¯åˆ†æ–¹ç¨‹: $$ N = \int_0^\infty \frac{1}{e^{E/k_B T_C}-1} V \frac{g_s}{4\pi^2} (\frac{2m}{\hbar^2})^{3/2} \sqrt{E} dE $$ è¿™ä¸ªå®šç§¯åˆ†çš„ç»“æœå¯ä»¥è§£å‡º $T_C$ã€‚

  3. ä¸´ç•Œæ¸©åº¦ $T_C$ å…¬å¼:

    $$ T_C = (\frac{n}{g_s \zeta(3/2)})^{2/3} \frac{2\pi\hbar^2}{m k_B} $$

    å…¶ä¸­ $n=N/V$ æ˜¯ç²’å­æ•°å¯†åº¦ï¼Œ$\zeta(3/2) \approx 2.612$ æ˜¯é»æ›¼Zetaå‡½æ•°ã€‚å…³é”®: $T_C \propto n^{2/3}$ã€‚

  4. å‡èšç›¸æ€§è´¨ ($T<T_C$):

    • å‡èšä½“åˆ†æ•° (åŸºæ€ç²’å­å æ¯”): $$ \frac{N_0}{N} = 1 - (\frac{T}{T_C})^{3/2} $$
    • çƒ­åŠ›å­¦æ€§è´¨ (æ­¤æ—¶ $\mu \approx 0$):
      • å‹å¼º: $P = g_s \zeta(5/2) k_B (\frac{m k_B}{2\pi\hbar^2})^{3/2} T^{5/2} \propto T^{5/2}$ã€‚å‹å¼ºä¸ä½“ç§¯ V æ— å…³ï¼
      • å†…èƒ½: $U \propto V T^{5/2}$ã€‚
      • çƒ­å®¹: $C_V = (\frac{\partial U}{\partial T})_V \propto V T^{3/2}$ã€‚

2. å…‰å­æ°”ä½“ (é»‘ä½“è¾å°„)

æ˜¯ç†æƒ³ç»è‰²æ°”ä½“çš„ä¸€ä¸ªé‡è¦ç‰¹ä¾‹ã€‚

  • æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹å¾: å…‰å­å¯ä»¥è¢«å™¨å£äº§ç”Ÿå’Œå¸æ”¶ï¼Œå› æ­¤ç²’å­æ•°ä¸å®ˆæ’ã€‚
  • æ•°å­¦åæœ: ä½“ç³»çš„è‡ªç”±èƒ½å¯¹ç²’å­æ•°Næ±‚å¯¼æ’ä¸ºé›¶ï¼Œè¿™æ„å‘³ç€åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿æ’ä¸ºé›¶ $\mu \equiv 0$ã€‚

æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼

ç‰©ç†å›¾åƒ

ç©ºè…”ä¸­çš„ç”µç£åœºå¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ— æ•°ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„è°æŒ¯å­ï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªè°æŒ¯å­è¢«é‡å­åŒ–åå°±æ˜¯èƒ½é‡ä¸º $h\nu$ çš„å…‰å­ã€‚ç©ºè…”å£ä¸è¿™äº›å…‰å­å¤„äºçƒ­å¹³è¡¡ã€‚æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼æè¿°çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œåœ¨æ¸©åº¦Tä¸‹ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªâ€œå…‰å­æµ·æ´‹â€ä¸­ï¼Œä¸åŒé¢‘ç‡ï¼ˆé¢œè‰²ï¼‰çš„å…‰å­æ‰€æºå¸¦çš„èƒ½é‡æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•åˆ†å¸ƒçš„ã€‚

æ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯

  1. ç›®æ ‡: è®¡ç®—é¢‘ç‡åœ¨ $\nu$ åˆ° $\nu+d\nu$ ä¹‹é—´çš„è¾å°„èƒ½é‡å¯†åº¦ $u(\nu)d\nu$ã€‚
  2. $u(\nu)d\nu = (\text{è¯¥é¢‘ç‡èŒƒå›´å†…çš„æ€æ•°}) \times (\text{æ¯ä¸ªæ€çš„å¹³å‡èƒ½é‡})$ã€‚
  3. æ€æ•°: åˆ©ç”¨å…‰å­çš„æ€å¯†åº¦å…¬å¼ $g(E)$ï¼Œå¹¶è½¬æ¢æˆé¢‘ç‡çš„å‡½æ•°ã€‚$E=h\nu \implies g(\nu)d\nu = g(E)dE$ã€‚ $$ g(\nu)d\nu = V \frac{8\pi \nu^2}{c^3} d\nu $$ å•ä½ä½“ç§¯å†…çš„æ€æ•°å³ä¸º $g_V(\nu)d\nu = \frac{8\pi \nu^2}{c^3} d\nu$ã€‚
  4. æ¯ä¸ªæ€çš„å¹³å‡èƒ½é‡: (å•ä¸ªå…‰å­èƒ½é‡ $h\nu$) $\times$ (è¯¥æ€çš„å…‰å­å æ®æ•° $f_{BE}(h\nu)$)ã€‚ ç”±äº $\mu=0$ï¼Œå æ®æ•°ä¸º $\frac{1}{e^{h\nu/k_B T}-1}$ã€‚
  5. ç»„åˆ: $u(\nu)d\nu = \frac{8\pi \nu^2}{c^3} \cdot (h\nu) \cdot \frac{1}{e^{h\nu/k_B T}-1} d\nu$

é‡è¦ç»“è®º

  • æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼: $$ u(\nu, T) = \frac{8\pi h\nu^3}{c^3} \frac{1}{e^{h\nu/k_B T} - 1} $$
  • æ–¯ç‰¹è—©-ç»å°”å…¹æ›¼å®šå¾‹: å¯¹æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼ç§¯åˆ†å¾—åˆ°æ€»èƒ½é‡å¯†åº¦ã€‚ $u = \frac{U}{V} = \frac{8\pi^5 k_B^4}{15c^3h^3} T^4 = \sigma T^4$ã€‚ æ€»èƒ½é‡ä¸ $T^4$ æˆæ­£æ¯”ã€‚
  • ç»´æ©ä½ç§»å®šå¾‹: å¯¹æ™®æœ—å…‹å…¬å¼æ±‚æå¤§å€¼ç‚¹ã€‚ $\lambda_{max} T = b = \text{å¸¸æ•°}$ã€‚

3. è‡ªç”±ç”µå­æ°” (ç†æƒ³è´¹ç±³æ°”ä½“)

3.1 åŸºæœ¬æ€§è´¨ä¸åˆ†å¸ƒ

  • ç²’å­: éµå¾ªè´¹ç±³-ç‹„æ‹‰å…‹ç»Ÿè®¡çš„åŠæ•´æ•°è‡ªæ—‹ç²’å­ (è´¹ç±³å­)ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒæ˜¯æ³¡åˆ©ä¸ç›¸å®¹åŸç†ã€‚
  • åˆ†å¸ƒå‡½æ•°: $$ f_{FD}(E) = \frac{1}{e^{(E-\mu)/k_B T} + 1} $$ åˆ†æ¯ä¸­çš„ +1 å¯¼è‡´ä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ªæ€çš„å æ®æ•°éƒ½ä¸å¯èƒ½å¤§äº1ï¼Œè¿™æ­£æ˜¯æ³¡åˆ©åŸç†çš„ä½“ç°ã€‚åœ¨T=0Kæ—¶ï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯å®Œç¾çš„é˜¶è·ƒå‡½æ•°ã€‚
  • åŒ–å­¦åŠ¿ $\mu$: T=0Kæ—¶ï¼Œ$\mu(0) = E_F > 0$ã€‚

3.2 è´¹ç±³èƒ½ $E_F$

ç‰©ç†å›¾åƒ

ç”±äºæ³¡åˆ©ä¸ç›¸å®¹åŸç†ï¼Œç”µå­ä¸èƒ½éƒ½æŒ¤åœ¨æœ€ä½èƒ½é‡æ€ã€‚åœ¨T=0Kï¼Œå®ƒä»¬ä¼šåƒå¾€æ°´æ¯é‡Œå€’æ°´ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä»èƒ½é‡æœ€ä½çš„â€œæ¯åº•â€å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¸€ä¸ªä¸€ä¸ªåœ°å¡«å……æ‰€æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„èƒ½çº§ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ç”µå­éƒ½â€œå®‰å®¶è½æˆ·â€ã€‚è´¹ç±³èƒ½å°±æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªç”µå­â€œæµ·æ´‹â€çš„æœ€é«˜â€œæµ·å¹³é¢â€çš„èƒ½é‡ã€‚å®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”±ç”µå­å¯†åº¦å†³å®šçš„å†…åœ¨èƒ½é‡æ ‡åº¦ï¼Œå³ä½¿åœ¨ç»å¯¹é›¶åº¦ä¹Ÿå­˜åœ¨ï¼Œä»£è¡¨äº†ç”µå­å› â€œé‡å­ç®€å¹¶â€è€Œè¢«è¿«æ‹¥æœ‰çš„å·¨å¤§åŠ¨èƒ½ã€‚

æ¨å¯¼æ€è·¯

  1. æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³: åœ¨ T=0Kï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰èƒ½é‡ $E \le E_F$ çš„æ€éƒ½è¢«å¡«æ»¡ï¼Œè€Œæ‰€æœ‰ $E > E_F$ çš„æ€éƒ½æ˜¯ç©ºçš„ã€‚
  2. å»ºç«‹æ–¹ç¨‹: ç³»ç»Ÿæ€»ç”µå­æ•° $N$ å¿…é¡»ç­‰äº $E_F$ ä»¥ä¸‹çš„æ€»é‡å­æ€æ•°ã€‚ $$ N = \int_0^{E_F} g(E) dE $$
  3. ä»£å…¥DOS: å¯¹ç”µå­ï¼Œ$g_s=2$ (è‡ªæ—‹å‘ä¸Šå’Œå‘ä¸‹)ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨æœ‰è´¨é‡ç²’å­çš„DOSå…¬å¼: $$ N = \int_0^{E_F} V \frac{2}{4\pi^2} (\frac{2m_e}{\hbar^2})^{3/2} \sqrt{E} dE $$
  4. æ±‚è§£ç§¯åˆ†: ç§¯åˆ† $\sqrt{E}$ å¾—åˆ° $\frac{2}{3}E^{3/2}$ã€‚ $$ N = V \frac{1}{3\pi^2} (\frac{2m_e}{\hbar^2})^{3/2} E_F^{3/2} $$
  5. åè§£ $E_F$: æ•´ç†ä¸Šå¼ï¼Œç”¨ç”µå­æ•°å¯†åº¦ $n=N/V$ æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºã€‚ $$ E_F = \frac{\hbar^2}{2m_e}(3\pi^2 n)^{2/3} $$

é‡è¦ç»“è®º

  • è´¹ç±³èƒ½: $$ E_F = \frac{\hbar^2}{2m_e}(3\pi^2 n)^{2/3} $$ åªä¾èµ–äºç”µå­å¯†åº¦ $n$ã€‚
  • åŸºæ€æ€»èƒ½é‡ ($T=0$ K): $U_0 = \int_0^{E_F} E g(E) dE = \frac{3}{5} N E_F$
  • ç®€å¹¶å‹ ($T=0$ K): $P_0 = -\frac{\partial U_0}{\partial V} = \frac{2}{3}\frac{U_0}{V} = \frac{2}{5}nE_F$ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¯ç²¹çš„é‡å­å‹åŠ›ï¼Œå³ä½¿åœ¨é›¶æ¸©ä¸‹ä¹Ÿå­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ”¯æ’‘ç€ç™½çŸ®æ˜Ÿç­‰å¤©ä½“ã€‚
  • ä½æ¸©ç”µå­çƒ­å®¹ ($T \ll T_F=E_F/k_B$): $$ C_V = \frac{\pi^2}{2} N k_B \frac{T}{T_F} \propto T $$ çƒ­å®¹ä¸æ¸©åº¦æˆçº¿æ€§å…³ç³»ï¼Œå› ä¸ºåªæœ‰åœ¨è´¹ç±³é¢é™„è¿‘ $k_B T$ èƒ½é‡èŒƒå›´å†…çš„ç”µå­æ‰èƒ½è¢«çƒ­æ¿€å‘ã€‚

#include "xil_io.h"
#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xparameters_ps.h"
#include "xil_printf.h"
#include "xgpio.h"
#include "xgpiops.h"
#include "xuartps.h"
#include "xuartps_hw.h"
void PL_SW_INIT();
void PS_GPIO_INIT();
void delay_1s();
void led_on_off(u32 on);
void uart_init();
XGpio pl_sw;
XGpioPs ps_gpio;
XGpioPs_Config ps_gpio_config;
XUartPs uart;
XUartPs_Config uart_config;
void main()
{
 print("hello world\n");
 PL_SW_INIT();
 PS_GPIO_INIT();
 u32 pin12,pin13,pin14,pin15,pin47;
 u32 sw_cur,sw_last=0;
 u32 pl_sw_state;
 XGpio_DiscreteSet(&pl_sw,2,0xff);
 while(1)
 {
 /* led_on_off(1);
 delay_1s();
 led_on_off(0);
 delay_1s();*/
 pl_sw_state=XGpio_DiscreteRead(&pl_sw,1);
 XGpio_DiscreteWrite(&pl_sw,2,pl_sw_state);
 pin12=XGpioPs_ReadPin(&ps_gpio, 12);
 pin13=XGpioPs_ReadPin(&ps_gpio, 13);
 pin14=XGpioPs_ReadPin(&ps_gpio, 14);
 pin15=XGpioPs_ReadPin(&ps_gpio, 15);
 pin47=XGpioPs_ReadPin(&ps_gpio, 47);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 7, pin47);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 8, pin12);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 9, pin14);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 10, pin15);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 11, pin13);
 sw_cur=XGpio_DiscreteRead(&pl_sw, 1);
 /* if(sw_cur&0x1==0x1)
 {
 led_on_off(1);
 }
 else {
 led_on_off(0);
 }*/
 if(sw_cur!=sw_last)
 {
 xil_printf("pl key is %x\n",sw_cur);
 sw_last=sw_cur;
 }

 }



}
void PL_SW_INIT()
{
 //åˆå§‹åŒ–ç»“æ„ä½“
 XGpio_Initialize(&pl_sw, XPAR_AXI_GPIO_1_BASEADDR);
 //è®¾ç½®é€šé“1ï¼Œ8ä½ä¸ºè¾“å…¥æ¨¡å¼
 XGpio_SetDataDirection(&pl_sw, 1,0xff);//1è¾“å…¥ï¼Œ0è¾“å‡º
 XGpio_SetDataDirection(&pl_sw, 2,0);
}

void PS_GPIO_INIT()
{
 XGpioPs_CfgInitialize(&ps_gpio, &ps_gpio_config,XPAR_XGPIOPS_0_BASEADDR);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 12, 0);//0è¾“å…¥ï¼Œ1è¾“å‡º
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 13, 0);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 14, 0);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 15, 0);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 47, 0);

 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 7, 1);
 XGpioPs_SetOutputEnablePin(&ps_gpio,7,1);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 8, 1);
 XGpioPs_SetOutputEnablePin(&ps_gpio,8,1);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 9, 1);
 XGpioPs_SetOutputEnablePin(&ps_gpio,9,1);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 10, 1);
 XGpioPs_SetOutputEnablePin(&ps_gpio,10,1);
 XGpioPs_SetDirectionPin(&ps_gpio, 11, 1);
 XGpioPs_SetOutputEnablePin(&ps_gpio,11,1);

}
void delay_1s()
{
 for(int i=0;i<1000000;i++)
 for(int j=0;j<100;j++);
}

void led_on_off(u32 on)
{

 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 7, on);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 8, on);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 9, on);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 10, on);
 XGpioPs_WritePin(&ps_gpio, 11, on);
}

void uart_init()
{
 XUartPs_CfgInitialize(&uart,&uart_config,XPS_UART1_BASEADDR);
 XUartPs_SetBaudRate(&uart,115200);
}

#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xspi.h"
#include "xspi_i.h"
#include "xspi_l.h"
#include "xil_io.h"
#include "sleep.h"

XSpi spi_dac;
u8 dac_send[2];
u8 dac_recv[2]={0};
// spi_dac:CPOL=1;CPHA=0
u32 dac_option=XSP_MASTER_OPTION|XSP_CLK_ACTIVE_LOW_OPTION|XSP_MANUAL_SSELECT_OPTION;
//u32 dac_option=XSP_MASTER_OPTION|XSP_CLK_ACTIVE_LOW_OPTION;
int main(void){
 XSpi_Initialize(&spi_dac, XPAR_DAC_SPI_BASEADDR);
 XSpi_SetOptions(&spi_dac, dac_option);
 XSpi_Start(&spi_dac);
 while(1){
 sleep(1);
 XSpi_SetSlaveSelect(&spi_dac,0x01);
 //XSpi_SetSlaveSelectReg(&spi_dac, 0x01);
 u16 dac_mode=(0x00);
 u16 dac_value=1000;
 u16 dac_data=dac_value|(dac_mode <<12);

 dac_send[0]=dac_data>>8;
 dac_send[1]=dac_data&0xff;
 XSpi_Transfer(&spi_dac, dac_send, dac_recv,2);
 XSpi_SetSlaveSelect(&spi_dac,0x00);
 //XSpi_SetSlaveSelectReg(&spi_dac, 0x00);
 sleep(1);
 XSpi_SetSlaveSelect(&spi_dac,0x01);
 //XSpi_SetSlaveSelectReg(&spi_dac, 0x01);
 dac_mode=(0x00);
 dac_value=0;
 dac_data=dac_value|(dac_mode <<12);

 dac_send[0]=dac_data>>8;
 dac_send[1]=dac_data&0xff;
 XSpi_Transfer(&spi_dac, dac_send, dac_recv,2);
 XSpi_SetSlaveSelect(&spi_dac,0x00);
 //XSpi_SetSlaveSelectReg(&spi_dac, 0x00);

 }

}

module generate_for1(
input logic clk,
input logic in,
output logic [3:0]out
 );

genvar i;

generate
for(i=1;i<=3;i=i+1) begin
always_ff@(posedge clk) begin
out[0]<=in;

out[i]<=out[i-1];
end
end

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# --- 1. åˆ›å»ºç”»å¸ƒ(Figure)å’Œå­å›¾(Axes) ---
# figæ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªç”»å¸ƒï¼Œaxæ˜¯å…·ä½“çš„ç»˜å›¾åŒºåŸŸ
# nrows=1, ncols=1 è¡¨ç¤ºåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª1x1çš„ç½‘æ ¼ï¼Œå³åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå­å›¾
fig, ax = plt.subplots(nrows=1, ncols=1, figsize=(10, 6)) # figsizeæ§åˆ¶ç”»å¸ƒå¤§å°

# --- 2. åœ¨Axesä¸Šç»˜å›¾ ---
# æ‰€æœ‰ç»˜å›¾æ“ä½œéƒ½é€šè¿‡axå¯¹è±¡å®Œæˆï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯plt
# x_data, y_data = ... (ä½ çš„æ•°æ®)
# ax.plot(x_data, y_data, label='My Data') 

# --- 3. ç²¾ç»†åŒ–å®šåˆ¶Axes ---
ax.set_title("This is the Title", fontsize=16)
ax.set_xlabel("X-axis Label", fontsize=12)
ax.set_ylabel("Y-axis Label", fontsize=12)
ax.grid(True, linestyle='--', alpha=0.6) # æ·»åŠ ç½‘æ ¼çº¿
ax.legend(fontsize=10) # æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾ä¾‹

# --- 4. è°ƒæ•´å¸ƒå±€å¹¶æ˜¾ç¤º ---
plt.tight_layout() # è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒæ•´å­å›¾å‚æ•°ï¼Œä½¿ä¹‹å¡«å……æ•´ä¸ªå›¾åƒåŒºåŸŸ
plt.show()

è®°ä½è¿™ä¸ªæ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œä½ å°±æŒæ¡äº†å¥—è·¯çš„ç²¾é«“ã€‚

NumPy & Matplotlib å¸¸ç”¨å‡½æ•°ä¸ä½œå›¾å¥—è·¯

ä¸‹é¢æˆ‘å°†ä½œå›¾éœ€æ±‚åˆ†ä¸ºå‡ å¤§ç±»ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ç±»éƒ½æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªâ€œå¥—è·¯â€å’Œç›¸å…³çš„å¸¸ç”¨å‡½æ•°ã€‚

å¥—è·¯ä¸€ï¼šå•çº¿/å¤šçº¿å¯¹æ¯”å›¾ (æœ€å¸¸ç”¨)

åœºæ™¯ï¼šå¯¹æ¯”æ»¤æ³¢å‰åçš„ä¿¡å·ã€ä¸åŒå‚æ•°ä¸‹çš„æ¨¡å‹æ€§èƒ½ã€ç†è®ºå€¼ä¸å®é™…å€¼ã€‚

æµç¨‹ï¼š

  1. ç”¨np.linspaceæˆ–np.arangeåˆ›å»ºç»Ÿä¸€çš„Xè½´æ•°æ®ã€‚
  2. åœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªaxå¯¹è±¡ä¸Šå¤šæ¬¡è°ƒç”¨plot()ã€‚
  3. é€šè¿‡labelå‚æ•°åŒºåˆ†ä¸åŒæ›²çº¿ï¼Œæœ€åç”¨ax.legend()æ˜¾ç¤ºå›¾ä¾‹ã€‚

# --- æ•°æ®å‡†å¤‡ (NumPy) ---
fs = 1000
t = np.linspace(0, 1, fs, endpoint=False) # 0åˆ°1ç§’çš„æ—¶é—´è½´
signal_clean = np.sin(2 * np.pi * 5 * t)
noise = 0.5 * np.random.randn(len(t))

# --- Matplotlib å¥—è·¯ ---

 u32 led_control=10*(recv_package[0]-'0')+(recv_package[1]-'0');
 //xil_printf("%u",led_control);

 XGpio_DiscreteWrite(&pl_sw,2,led_control);



 //XUartLite_Send(&puart_lite,recv_package,2);
 //XUartLite_Send(&puart_lite,send_package,2);
 }

}

2. æ—¶é’Ÿçº¦æŸï¼ˆClock Constraintsï¼‰

ç”¨äº PLL/MMCM è¾“å‡ºæˆ–åˆ†é¢‘/å€é¢‘æ—¶é’Ÿï¼š

3. è¾“å…¥/è¾“å‡ºå»¶è¿Ÿçº¦æŸï¼ˆI/O Delayï¼‰

4. æ—¶åºä¾‹å¤–ï¼ˆTiming Exceptionsï¼‰

ç”¨äºè¦†ç›–é»˜è®¤æ—¶åºåˆ†æï¼Œå¦‚å¤šå‘¨æœŸè·¯å¾„ã€ä¼ªè·¯å¾„ç­‰ã€‚

  • å•ä½ï¼šæ—¶é—´å•ä½é»˜è®¤ä¸ºçº³ç§’ï¼ˆnsï¼‰ï¼Œå¯çœç•¥ã€‚
  • æ³¨é‡Šï¼šä½¿ç”¨ # å¼€å¤´ã€‚

`timescale 1 ns / 1 ps

 module myip_slave_lite_v1_0_S00_AXI #
 (
 // Users to add parameters here

 // User parameters ends
 // Do not modify the parameters beyond this line

 // Width of S_AXI data bus
 parameter integer C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH = 32,
 // Width of S_AXI address bus
 parameter integer C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH = 4
 )
 (
 // Users to add ports here

 // User ports ends
 // Do not modify the ports beyond this line

 // Global Clock Signal
 input wire S_AXI_ACLK,
 // Global Reset Signal. This Signal is Active LOW
 input wire S_AXI_ARESETN,
 // Write address (issued by master, acceped by Slave)
 input wire [C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH-1 : 0] S_AXI_AWADDR,
 // Write channel Protection type. This signal indicates the
 // privilege and security level of the transaction, and whether
 // the transaction is a data access or an instruction access.
 input wire [2 : 0] S_AXI_AWPROT,
 // Write address valid. This signal indicates that the master signaling
 // valid write address and control information.
 input wire S_AXI_AWVALID,
 // Write address ready. This signal indicates that the slave is ready
 // to accept an address and associated control signals.
 output wire S_AXI_AWREADY,
 // Write data (issued by master, acceped by Slave)
 input wire [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1 : 0] S_AXI_WDATA,
 // Write strobes. This signal indicates which byte lanes hold
 // valid data. There is one write strobe bit for each eight
 // bits of the write data bus.
 input wire [(C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/8)-1 : 0] S_AXI_WSTRB,
 // Write valid. This signal indicates that valid write
 // data and strobes are available.
 input wire S_AXI_WVALID,
 // Write ready. This signal indicates that the slave
 // can accept the write data.
 output wire S_AXI_WREADY,
 // Write response. This signal indicates the status
 // of the write transaction.
 output wire [1 : 0] S_AXI_BRESP,
 // Write response valid. This signal indicates that the channel
 // is signaling a valid write response.
 output wire S_AXI_BVALID,
 // Response ready. This signal indicates that the master
 // can accept a write response.
 input wire S_AXI_BREADY,
 // Read address (issued by master, acceped by Slave)
 input wire [C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH-1 : 0] S_AXI_ARADDR,
 // Protection type. This signal indicates the privilege
 // and security level of the transaction, and whether the
 // transaction is a data access or an instruction access.
 input wire [2 : 0] S_AXI_ARPROT,
 // Read address valid. This signal indicates that the channel
 // is signaling valid read address and control information.
 input wire S_AXI_ARVALID,
 // Read address ready. This signal indicates that the slave is
 // ready to accept an address and associated control signals.
 output wire S_AXI_ARREADY,
 // Read data (issued by slave)
 output wire [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1 : 0] S_AXI_RDATA,
 // Read response. This signal indicates the status of the
 // read transfer.
 output wire [1 : 0] S_AXI_RRESP,
 // Read valid. This signal indicates that the channel is
 // signaling the required read data.
 output wire S_AXI_RVALID,
 // Read ready. This signal indicates that the master can
 // accept the read data and response information.
 input wire S_AXI_RREADY
 );

 // AXI4LITE signals
 reg [C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH-1 : 0] axi_awaddr;
 reg axi_awready;
 reg axi_wready;
 reg [1 : 0] axi_bresp;
 reg axi_bvalid;
 reg [C_S_AXI_ADDR_WIDTH-1 : 0] axi_araddr;
 reg axi_arready;
 reg [1 : 0] axi_rresp;
 reg axi_rvalid;

 // Example-specific design signals
 // local parameter for addressing 32 bit / 64 bit C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH
 // ADDR_LSB is used for addressing 32/64 bit registers/memories
 // ADDR_LSB = 2 for 32 bits (n downto 2)
 // ADDR_LSB = 3 for 64 bits (n downto 3)
 localparam integer ADDR_LSB = (C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/32) + 1;
 localparam integer OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS = 1;
 //----------------------------------------------
 //-- Signals for user logic register space example
 //------------------------------------------------
 //-- Number of Slave Registers 4
 reg [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1:0] slv_reg0;
 reg [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1:0] slv_reg1;
 reg [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1:0] slv_reg2;
 reg [C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH-1:0] slv_reg3;
 integer byte_index;

 // I/O Connections assignments

 assign S_AXI_AWREADY = axi_awready;
 assign S_AXI_WREADY = axi_wready;
 assign S_AXI_BRESP = axi_bresp;
 assign S_AXI_BVALID = axi_bvalid;
 assign S_AXI_ARREADY = axi_arready;
 assign S_AXI_RRESP = axi_rresp;
 assign S_AXI_RVALID = axi_rvalid;
 //state machine varibles
 reg [1:0] state_write;
 reg [1:0] state_read;
 //State machine local parameters
 localparam Idle = 2'b00,Raddr = 2'b10,Rdata = 2'b11 ,Waddr = 2'b10,Wdata = 2'b11;
 // Implement Write state machine
 // Outstanding write transactions are not supported by the slave i.e., master should assert bready to receive response on or before it starts sending the new transaction
 always @(posedge S_AXI_ACLK)
 begin
 if (S_AXI_ARESETN == 1'b0)
 begin
 axi_awready <= 0;
 axi_wready <= 0;
 axi_bvalid <= 0;
 axi_bresp <= 0;
 axi_awaddr <= 0;
 state_write <= Idle;
 end
 else
 begin
 case(state_write)
 Idle:
 begin
 if(S_AXI_ARESETN == 1'b1)
 begin
 axi_awready <= 1'b1;
 axi_wready <= 1'b1;
 state_write <= Waddr;
 end
 else state_write <= state_write;
 end
 Waddr: //At this state, slave is ready to receive address along with corresponding control signals and first data packet. Response valid is also handled at this state
 begin
 if (S_AXI_AWVALID && S_AXI_AWREADY)
 begin
 axi_awaddr <= S_AXI_AWADDR;
 if(S_AXI_WVALID)
 begin
 axi_awready <= 1'b1;
 state_write <= Waddr;
 axi_bvalid <= 1'b1;
 end
 else
 begin
 axi_awready <= 1'b0;
 state_write <= Wdata;
 if (S_AXI_BREADY && axi_bvalid) axi_bvalid <= 1'b0;
 end
 end
 else
 begin
 state_write <= state_write;
 if (S_AXI_BREADY && axi_bvalid) axi_bvalid <= 1'b0;
 end
 end
 Wdata: //At this state, slave is ready to receive the data packets until the number of transfers is equal to burst length
 begin
 if (S_AXI_WVALID)
 begin
 state_write <= Waddr;
 axi_bvalid <= 1'b1;
 axi_awready <= 1'b1;
 end
 else
 begin
 state_write <= state_write;
 if (S_AXI_BREADY && axi_bvalid) axi_bvalid <= 1'b0;
 end
 end
 endcase
 end
 end

 // Implement memory mapped register select and write logic generation
 // The write data is accepted and written to memory mapped registers when
 // axi_awready, S_AXI_WVALID, axi_wready and S_AXI_WVALID are asserted. Write strobes are used to
 // select byte enables of slave registers while writing.
 // These registers are cleared when reset (active low) is applied.
 // Slave register write enable is asserted when valid address and data are available
 // and the slave is ready to accept the write address and write data.


 always @( posedge S_AXI_ACLK )
 begin
 if ( S_AXI_ARESETN == 1'b0 )
 begin
 slv_reg0 <= 0;
 slv_reg1 <= 0;
 slv_reg2 <= 0;
 slv_reg3 <= 0;
 end
 else begin
 if (S_AXI_WVALID)
 begin
 case ( (S_AXI_AWVALID) ? S_AXI_AWADDR[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] : axi_awaddr[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] )
 2'h0:
 for ( byte_index = 0; byte_index <= (C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/8)-1; byte_index = byte_index+1 )
 if ( S_AXI_WSTRB[byte_index] == 1 ) begin
 // Respective byte enables are asserted as per write strobes
 // Slave register 0
 slv_reg0[(byte_index*8) +: 8] <= S_AXI_WDATA[(byte_index*8) +: 8];
 end
 2'h1:
 for ( byte_index = 0; byte_index <= (C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/8)-1; byte_index = byte_index+1 )
 if ( S_AXI_WSTRB[byte_index] == 1 ) begin
 // Respective byte enables are asserted as per write strobes
 // Slave register 1
 slv_reg1[(byte_index*8) +: 8] <= S_AXI_WDATA[(byte_index*8) +: 8];
 end
 2'h2:
 for ( byte_index = 0; byte_index <= (C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/8)-1; byte_index = byte_index+1 )
 if ( S_AXI_WSTRB[byte_index] == 1 ) begin
 // Respective byte enables are asserted as per write strobes
 // Slave register 2
 slv_reg2[(byte_index*8) +: 8] <= S_AXI_WDATA[(byte_index*8) +: 8];
 end
 2'h3:
 for ( byte_index = 0; byte_index <= (C_S_AXI_DATA_WIDTH/8)-1; byte_index = byte_index+1 )
 if ( S_AXI_WSTRB[byte_index] == 1 ) begin
 // Respective byte enables are asserted as per write strobes
 // Slave register 3
 slv_reg3[(byte_index*8) +: 8] <= S_AXI_WDATA[(byte_index*8) +: 8];
 end
 default : begin
 slv_reg0 <= slv_reg0;
 slv_reg1 <= slv_reg1;
 slv_reg2 <= slv_reg2;
 slv_reg3 <= slv_reg3;
 end
 endcase
 end
 end
 end

 // Implement read state machine
 always @(posedge S_AXI_ACLK)
 begin
 if (S_AXI_ARESETN == 1'b0)
 begin
 //asserting initial values to all 0's during reset
 axi_arready <= 1'b0;
 axi_rvalid <= 1'b0;
 axi_rresp <= 1'b0;
 state_read <= Idle;
 end
 else
 begin
 case(state_read)
 Idle: //Initial state inidicating reset is done and ready to receive read/write transactions
 begin
 if (S_AXI_ARESETN == 1'b1)
 begin
 state_read <= Raddr;
 axi_arready <= 1'b1;
 end
 else state_read <= state_read;
 end
 Raddr: //At this state, slave is ready to receive address along with corresponding control signals
 begin
 if (S_AXI_ARVALID && S_AXI_ARREADY)
 begin
 state_read <= Rdata;
 axi_araddr <= S_AXI_ARADDR;
 axi_rvalid <= 1'b1;
 axi_arready <= 1'b0;
 end
 else state_read <= state_read;
 end
 Rdata: //At this state, slave is ready to send the data packets until the number of transfers is equal to burst length
 begin
 if (S_AXI_RVALID && S_AXI_RREADY)
 begin
 axi_rvalid <= 1'b0;
 axi_arready <= 1'b1;
 state_read <= Raddr;
 end
 else state_read <= state_read;
 end
 endcase
 end
 end
 // Implement memory mapped register select and read logic generation
 assign S_AXI_RDATA = (axi_araddr[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] == 2'h0) ? slv_reg0 : (axi_araddr[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] == 2'h1) ? slv_reg1 : (axi_araddr[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] == 2'h2) ? slv_reg2 : (axi_araddr[ADDR_LSB+OPT_MEM_ADDR_BITS:ADDR_LSB] == 2'h3) ? slv_reg3 : 0;
 // Add user logic here

 // User logic ends

 endmodule

AXIåè®®çš„çµé­‚æ˜¯**â€œVALID/READYâ€æ¡æ‰‹æœºåˆ¶**ã€‚å¿˜æ‰æ‰€æœ‰å¤æ‚çš„ä¿¡å·ï¼Œåªè®°ä½è¿™ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼š

é»„é‡‘æ³•åˆ™ï¼š åªæœ‰åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é’Ÿä¸Šå‡æ²¿ï¼Œå½“VALIDå’ŒREADYåŒæ—¶ä¸ºé«˜æ—¶ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ•°æ®ä¼ è¾“ï¼ˆæˆ–åœ°å€ä¼ è¾“ï¼‰æ‰ä¼šå‘ç”Ÿã€‚

è¿™ä¸ªæœºåˆ¶æå…¶å¼ºå¤§ï¼Œå®ƒå®Œç¾åœ°è§£å†³äº†å¿«æ…¢è®¾å¤‡ä¹‹é—´çš„é€šä¿¡é—®é¢˜ã€‚å¿«çš„è®¾å¤‡å¯ä»¥ç­‰æ…¢çš„è®¾å¤‡READYï¼Œæ…¢çš„è®¾å¤‡ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç­‰å¿«çš„è®¾å¤‡VALIDã€‚

AXI4-Liteçš„äº”ä¸ªâ€œé€šä¿¡æ¸ é“â€

AXI4-LiteæŠŠä¸€æ¬¡å®Œæ•´çš„è¯»/å†™æ“ä½œåˆ†æˆäº†å‡ ä¸ªç‹¬ç«‹çš„æ¸ é“ï¼Œå°±åƒé‚®å±€æŠŠå¯„ä¿¡å’Œæ”¶ä¿¡æµç¨‹åˆ†å¼€ä¸€æ ·ï¼š

æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªå·±è®¾è®¡PWMæ¨¡å—æ—¶ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æ‰®æ¼”â€œå·¥åŒ â€ï¼ˆSlaveï¼‰çš„è§’è‰²ï¼Œå“åº”å›½ç‹çš„æŒ‡ä»¤ã€‚å¹¸è¿çš„æ˜¯ï¼ŒVivadoå·¥å…·å¯ä»¥è‡ªåŠ¨å¸®æˆ‘ä»¬ç”Ÿæˆå¤„ç†è¿™äº›å¤æ‚æ¡æ‰‹é€»è¾‘çš„â€œç§˜ä¹¦â€ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦å’Œâ€œç§˜ä¹¦â€å¯¹è¯å°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚

å®æˆ˜ï¼šå¼•å¯¼ä½ å®ŒæˆAXI + PWMçš„IPå°è£…

ç°åœ¨ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠä¸Šé¢çš„ç†è®ºåº”ç”¨åˆ°ä½ çš„pwm.svä¸Šã€‚

æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³è½¬å˜

  • æ—§æ€æƒ³ï¼šperiod, duty1, duty2, duty3 æ˜¯ç‰©ç†è¾“å…¥ç«¯å£ï¼Œç”±å¤–éƒ¨çš„GPIOç¡¬è¿çº¿é©±åŠ¨ã€‚

//pwm.sv
// 1ä¸ªç«¯å£æ§åˆ¶è¾“å‡ºpwmçš„å‘¨æœŸï¼Œ3ä¸ªè¾“å…¥ç«¯å£åˆ†åˆ«æ§åˆ¶3ä¸ªè¾“å‡ºç«¯å£çš„å ç©ºæ¯”
module pwm (
 input logic clk,
 input logic [15:0] period,
 input logic [15:0] duty1,
 input logic [15:0] duty2,
 input logic [15:0] duty3,
 input logic rst,
 output logic pwm1,
 output logic pwm2,
 output logic pwm3
);

 logic [15:0] counter = 0;
 always_ff @(posedge clk, negedge rst) begin : pwm_block
 if (!rst) begin
 counter <= 0;
 end else begin
 if (counter < period - 1) counter <= counter + 1;
 else counter <= 0;
 //pmw1
 end
 end
 always_comb begin
 if (counter < duty1) begin
 pwm1 = 0;
 end else begin
 pwm1 = 1;
 end

 if (counter < duty2) begin
 pwm2 = 0;
 end else begin
 pwm2 = 1;
 end


 if (counter < duty3) begin
 pwm3 = 0;
 end else begin
 pwm3 = 1;
 end


 end
endmodule
// æ³¨ï¼šè¿™ä¸ªä»£ç å†™çš„å¹¶ä¸è§„èŒƒï¼Œåº”è¯¥æŠŠç»„åˆé€»è¾‘éƒ¨åˆ†æ”¾åˆ°æ—¶åºéƒ¨åˆ†å˜æˆåŒæ­¥æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå‡å°‘æ¯›åˆº

//tb_pwm.sv
module tb_pwm ();
 parameter real CLK_PERIOD = 10; //å‡è®¾æ—¶é’Ÿå‘¨æœŸä¸º10ns
 logic clk;
 logic [15:0] period;
 logic [15:0] duty1;
 logic [15:0] duty2;
 logic [15:0] duty3;
 logic rst;
 logic pwm1;
 logic pwm2;
 logic pwm3;
 pwm dut_pwm (
 .clk(clk),
 .period(period),
 .duty1(duty1),
 .duty2(duty2),
 .duty3(duty3),
 .rst(rst),
 .pwm1(pwm1),
 .pwm2(pwm2),
 .pwm3(pwm3)
 );

 initial begin
 clk = 0;
 end
 always begin
 #(CLK_PERIOD / 2) clk = ~clk;
 end

 initial begin
 rst = 1;
 @(posedge clk);
 period = 10;
 duty1 = 2;
 duty2 = 4;
 duty3 = 6;
 repeat (1000) @(posedge clk) ;
 $finish;
 end
endmodule

//ps ç«¯é€šè¿‡uartæ§åˆ¶å ç©ºæ¯”
//ps ç«¯é€šè¿‡uartæ§åˆ¶å ç©ºæ¯”
#include "xparameters.h"
#include "xil_io.h"
#include "xuartlite.h"
#include "xuartlite_l.h"
#include "xuartlite_i.h"

#define period_offset 0x00
#define duty1_offset 0x04
#define duty2_offset 0x08
#define duty3_offset 0x0c
int main(void){

 //uartlite
 XUartLite uartlite0;
 XUartLite_Initialize(&uartlite0,XPAR_XUARTLITE_0_BASEADDR);
 u8 recv_package[8];
 u8 send_package[8]={'i','n'};
 //XUartLite_Send(&uartlite0,send_package,2);
 // T=period/fclk
 // ç”±äºè®¾è®¡å¤±è¯¯,duty1,2,3åˆ†åˆ«è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªå‘¨æœŸå†…ä½ç”µå¹³çš„çŠ¶æ€æ•°

 u32 period=1000;
 u32 duty1=600;
 u32 duty2=400;
 u32 duty3=200;
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+period_offset,period);
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty1_offset,duty1);
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty2_offset,duty2);
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty3_offset,duty3);
 while(1)
 {
 XUartLite_Send(&uartlite0,send_package,2);
 //XUartLite_Send(&uartlite0,send_package,2);
 recv_package[0]=XUartLite_RecvByte(XPAR_XUARTLITE_0_BASEADDR);
 XUartLite_Send(&uartlite0,send_package,2);
 recv_package[1]=XUartLite_RecvByte(XPAR_XUARTLITE_0_BASEADDR);
 recv_package[2]=XUartLite_RecvByte(XPAR_XUARTLITE_0_BASEADDR);
 //XUartLite_Recv(&uartlite0,recv_package,3);
 XUartLite_Send(&uartlite0,send_package,2);
 u32 sum=10*(recv_package[1]-'0')+(recv_package[2]-'0');
 u32 duty=period-period*sum/100;
 if(recv_package[0]=='1')
 {
 duty1=duty;
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty1_offset,duty1);
 }

 else if(recv_package[0]=='2')
 {
 duty2=duty;
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty2_offset,duty2);
 }
 else
 {
 duty3=duty;
 Xil_Out32(XPAR_PWM_IP_0_BASEADDR+duty3_offset,duty3);
 }
 }
}

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

Headings

The following HTML <h1>â€”<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest section level while <h6> is the lowest.

H1

H2

H3

H4

H5
H6

Paragraph

Xerum, quo qui aut unt expliquam qui dolut labo. Aque venitatiusda cum, voluptionse latur sitiae dolessi aut parist aut dollo enim qui voluptate ma dolestendit peritin re plis aut quas inctum laceat est volestemque commosa as cus endigna tectur, offic to cor sequas etum rerum idem sintibus eiur? Quianimin porecus evelectur, cum que nis nust voloribus ratem aut omnimi, sitatur? Quiatem. Nam, omnis sum am facea corem alique molestrunt et eos evelece arcillit ut aut eos eos nus, sin conecerem erum fuga. Ri oditatquam, ad quibus unda veliamenimin cusam et facea ipsamus es exerum sitate dolores editium rerore eost, temped molorro ratiae volorro te reribus dolorer sperchicium faceata tiustia prat.

Itatur? Quiatae cullecum rem ent aut odis in re eossequodi nonsequ idebis ne sapicia is sinveli squiatum, core et que aut hariosam ex eat.

Blockquotes

The blockquote element represents content that is quoted from another source, optionally with a citation which must be within a footer or cite element, and optionally with in-line changes such as annotations and abbreviations.

Blockquote without attribution

Tiam, ad mint andaepu dandae nostion secatur sequo quae. Note that you can use Markdown syntax within a blockquote.

Blockquote with attribution

Don’t communicate by sharing memory, share memory by communicating.
â€” Rob Pike1

Tables

Tables aren’t part of the core Markdown spec, but Hugo supports supports them out-of-the-box.

Name Age
Bob 27
Alice 23

Inline Markdown within tables

Italics Bold Code
italics bold code

item.title: Image gallery
item.description:
Hugo theme Stack supports the creation of interactive image galleries using Markdown. It’s powered by PhotoSwipe and its syntax was inspired by Typlog.

To use this feature, the image must be in the same directory as the Markdown file, as it uses Hugo’s page bundle feature to read the dimensions of the image. External images are not supported.

Syntax 

1

![Image 1](1.jpg) ![Image 2](2.jpg)

Result

Photo by mymind and Luke Chesser on Unsplash

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description:
Stack has built-in support for math typesetting using KaTeX.

It’s not enabled by default side-wide, but you can enable it for individual posts by adding math: true to the front matter. Or you can enable it side-wide by adding math = true to the params.article section in config.toml.

Inline math

This is an inline mathematical expression: $\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦$

1

$\varphi = \dfrac{1+\sqrt5}{2}= 1.6180339887â€¦$
